Reviews.Title: “Clean, spacious room”
Reviews.Author: Bev F
Reviews.Content: We stayed three nights at Angel Inn. It was very clean, our room was spacious, and the pillow-top mattress was very comfortable! The motel is easy to find, yet very quiet. Staff was very friendly and helpful. We also enjoyed the indoor pool. We would definitely stay again at the Angel Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Great price, nice stay”
Reviews.Author: Rather_Nomadic
Reviews.Content: This is a fairly simple motel, located just off the main drag in Branson. It was clean, well-priced, good sized rooms, offered breakfast and had an indoor pool. It was exactly what we wanted for a long weekend trip with kids. Short drive to anything in Branson (and Silver Dollar City) and there's a grocery store within walking distance if you forget anything. I have already recommended the Angel Inn to budget-conscious friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “OUR WONDERFUL STAY AT THE ANGEL INN”
Reviews.Author: Luella S
Reviews.Content: We stayed here 6 nights. The place if absolutely spotless. The room was great. Breakfast was delicious. The maids were very polite and helpful and furnished us with all the towels, etc that we needed. The front desk people were exceptional. This motel is extremely quiet and is located right close to everything. We will definitely stay here again. Oh yeah, I saw a groundhog in the wooded area in the back along with loads of beautiful birds.

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay”
Reviews.Author: Dianne Y
Reviews.Content: This is our place of choice. We always stay at Angel Inn. It is quiet, clean and the rates are good. Friendly staff. The only negative was the wifi did not work. I was told next time to request a room away from outside wall. Enjoyed the stay. Will stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Branson Vacation”
Reviews.Author: Stephanie S
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for the first time and will be back next year. The Inn was very quiet. Parking was convenient. Our room was very clean. The breakfast is hot with many choices. Long pool hours (indoors with a hot tub). The staff was wonderful. Bringing fresh towels and coffee was not a problem. Room rates were reasonable. Check in and out was not a hassle. Will recommend to friends and will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Place to Stay in Branson!!! Aug. 2012”
Reviews.Author: Margie M
Reviews.Content: We had pillow top mattresses on our beds. They are WONDERFUL !!! So comfortable you don't want to get out of bed : ) The staff is very friendly. The price for our room was VERY reasonable. We had pleanty of towels & wash rags. If you stay in very many Motels you know that is very unusual. It was so nice not to have to request more towels. Our room was exceptionally clean !!! It smelled nice. Their breakfast was also VERY good. They are in a good location, not far off of the 76 strip. I cannot sing their praises enough. Congratulations to the staff at Angel Inn for a job well done. Margie

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for the money!”
Reviews.Author: kayjenlan3
Reviews.Content: We loved it! Breakfast included cereal, oatmeal, biscuits and gravy or french toast, fruit salad, bagels and donuts. The pool was indoor with a hot tub, it was pretty nice. A little off of the main road, but close enough to everything! The beds were comfortable and everything was clean! Would definitely stay there again and recommend it to a friend!

Reviews.Title: “Branson July 2012”
Reviews.Author: KFEnnis
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in several motels in Branson over the years, and for the price, The Angel Inn was a great place to stay and in an excellent location....just about a block off of the 76 strip, and right on one of the alternate routes where you did not have to travel everywhere by getting back on 76. The Tanger Mall is almost across from it on 76, Wal Mart, McDonalds, Panera Bread, Lone Star Steak House and many other places are within walking distance. We had a ground floor room..very quiet, and is about the only place I have ever stayed where you can not hear noises when guests arrive late or leave early..( beeping when they lock or open their cars, or banging around in the upstairs rooms) The air conditioner unit was not noisey like most of them either...Hot breakfast with french toast, eggs, biscuits & gravy plus all the normal 'continental' breakfast items. I WILL be staying there on my next trip to Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Just OK”
Reviews.Author: Private551
Reviews.Content: The hotel is in a good location near everything on the strip, but out of the traffic. The indoor pool is nice but was extrememly cold. My five year old didn't seem to mind. We ate the free breakfast on the first of our three days there. It didn't offer a large enough variety to please everyone in the family so we chose to go out the following two mornings. We booked through priceline and had no difficulty checking in on a busy Friday. The room we were given had a nice view and smelled clean. There were spots on the carpet but the carpet appeared vacuumed. Initially we were pleased with the room. After unloading the car and putting things away, I let my eight month old down on the floor to crawl around. She crawled across the room a couple times and then when I picked her up, her hands, feet, and knees were black. I rubbed my hand over the carpet and it turned black as well. When I told the woman at the desk about it she informed me that the carpet was due for a shampoo but that they had not been able to do it because of the busy season. I said I understood but that I would like a room with cleaner carpet. She stated that they were 100% booked and there was nothing they could do for us. I insisted that I needed a clean room for my child and she spoke to the facilty manager. He repeated everything she had said and implied that because we booked through priceline and not through them so we would not receive "preferential treatment'. I said I expect a clean room whether I book through them or through an alternative website. After several minutes of insisting on a clean room and refusing to change rooms each night I was staying with them, they agreed to put us in another for the duration of our stay. The new room we were given only turned my daughters knees grey, not black so I suppose it was a step up. After the initial hassle, we didn't complain again but will not be back.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: softballmomUsa
Reviews.Content: The only thing I would reccommend is to somehow build an additional sidewalk for guests who have to stay in the back building so that it is an easier walk to the main building with the office. It was a pain to have to walk that far for something, and having no direct sidewalk meant walking on the 'street' of the entryway which probably isn't the safest thing to do. It is also kind of spooky walking that far at night. We had no soap or shampoo or whatever it was supposed to be in our bathroom dispenser and I told the front desk- it didn't get filled for the 3 days we were there. I just asked for bar soap instead. On the last day they didn't give us an extra roll of toilet paper and we barely made due with what we had. Otherwise, I was really impressed with the staff- there was always someone there to help out. The woman re-filling the breakfast nook was unbelievable. I don't know how she was able to keep up with the re-filling like she did and keep tables wiped off at the same time- it was awesome. Loved the fact there was a fridge and microwave in every room- you don't usually find this in economy hotels.

Reviews.Title: “Angel Inn Visit”
Reviews.Author: Dianne Y
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at Angel Inn several times. The rooms have been clean and the beds comfortable. I have stayed in much fancier places but have also paid much more. My husband is diabetic and I count carbs so there was not a lot on the breakfast bar we could have however other guests appeared to enjoy it. We will stay again.

Reviews.Title: “A Welcomed Surprise”
Reviews.Author: Dinah N
Reviews.Content: The Angel Inn, was a very welcomed surprise, it was centrally located, it was modern, very clean, very accommodating with friendly and helpful staff, the rooms were fresh with all the little extras that make your traveling easier. Although we did not get the chance to enjoy the indoor pool or the hot tub, it was very inviting. The hotel sits on a hillside with a lovely view of the surrounding area. The price was very reasonable with a wide variety of hot breakfast items, French toast, eggs, bagels, biscuits, gravy & fruit, along with all the usual items you find at most hotels. If ever in this area we will make our reservations to repeat the lovely stay in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and cheap!”
Reviews.Author: kns_rn
Reviews.Content: Great place, very clean, very cheap. Don't book the room for the breakfast though, (high sugar and high fat) good location, alot of mini golf and shops near. Indoor pool and hot tub, but did not use, way too hot to swim indoors in ths summer.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: MamaBearCRTE
Reviews.Content: Angel Inn has friendly staff and clean, comfortable rooms. The breakfast is decent and alternates between french toast and biscuits and gravy as the main course. The pool is nice and my kids enjoyed it.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice”
Reviews.Author: kasketman
Reviews.Content: Nice clean room, excellent beds, and the food area was keep clean.

Reviews.Title: “Completely Surprised”
Reviews.Author: GoodsonKrewe
Reviews.Content: I have to admit that it takes a lot to surprise me when it comes to motel accommodations. My expectations of valued priced inns are usually pretty low. It's a motel. Angel Inn completely exceeded our expectations. First, the nightly rate was an excellent value. Second, the rooms were spacious and clean. The beds were not impressive but they were adequate. The pool area was indoor and acceptable, our kids loved it. We got back from Silver Dollar City late on a Friday and the staff allowed us to swim a little past the posted time. I was completely impressed with the friendliness of the staff, especially the front desk crew. Finally, the breakfast was good and also saved our family of five some money. We were happy to not have wasted a lot of money on more expensive accommodations while visiting Branson and will definitely stay at the Angel Inn in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay for the price.”
Reviews.Author: Melinda S
Reviews.Content: This is a great place to stay in Branson. We go to Branson often and are always on the lookout for a good hotel with good amenities that is not over priced. Service is fantastic. The room was very clean and quiet. I sometimes have a hard time getting enough rest at a motel, but the pillowtop bed made it very easy. We enjoyed the pool and hot tub, which was not very crowded at all. The next morning we went to breakfast and was pleasantly surprised at the quality of selections and the taste of what was offered. There was something for everyone. Great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Why go anywhere else?”
Reviews.Author: grininman
Reviews.Content: Everything you need is right here. Great location, very friendly staff (the pool man is very nice), and excellent breakfast (my wife likes the coffee better than mine). Our granddaughter taught herself to swim in the pool since she's in it almost every summer. Rooms have plenty of space even with 2 queens in them. WiFi in the rooms, fridge, microwave and some jetted bathtubs. They have got it all. Grandma and I will be back in the fall ( without the grandkids).

Reviews.Title: “Cant beat it for the money.”
Reviews.Author: John D
Reviews.Content: You cannot beat this place for what it costs per night. Room was very clean. Indoor pool and Hot Tub. Free breakfast that wasnt just cereal, toast and jelly or donuts. Your choice of eggs, french toast, biscuit and gravy, etc... Very nice employees everywhere. Will stay there again if I make the trip to Branson. Best beds in any motel Ive ever stayed in. Pillow top mattress was awsome.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful”
Reviews.Author: Tom N
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay in Branson. Rooms are large and clean. Very nice people. Very reasonable price and a good location off the strip. Centrally located and close to everything. We were very impressed with this non-chain hotel. We will definitely return and recommend highly.

Reviews.Title: “FANTASTIC”
Reviews.Author: Julie G
Reviews.Content: Very Nice and Clean. Breakfast was good. Staff very friendly and helpful. I think this was a great place to stay with a reasonable price. This was our first time and we will go back.

Reviews.Title: “Family Vacation”
Reviews.Author: blakewhite23
Reviews.Content: It never gets old writing a great review for this place. Me, my wife, and three girls ages 10, 2, and 7 months stayed here for a spring vacation and again the stay was very awesome. Due to scheduling conflicts 3 weeks before I talked with the front desk at least 4 separate times to change and move our reservations, and each time the same lady I talked to was more courteous than the previous time I had talked to her. All of the staff is excellent and will always recommend to anyone to stay here. A++++++++++

Reviews.Title: “Love staying theregks”
Reviews.Author: Glenda S
Reviews.Content: This is one of the cleanest motels we have stayed in. The personnel is very friendly. There beds are most comfortable. I would highly recommend Angel Inn to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Nice, Comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Jessica G
Reviews.Content: Stayed 6nights & would recommend! Very clean, towels were soft. I think the water is softened. Beds were soooo comfortable! About a block off the busy strip so close to everything, but still quiet. Right next to Walmart, McDonalds & Panera Bread. Owned by same folks who own AmericInn which also gets great reviews :) Staff very pleasant. Breakfast was decent, coffee delicious! Pool was usually busy w/ kids, but lots of seating & a hot tub for adults. WIFI in rooms was convenient. Bathroom ceiling showed small spots of rust & walls in bathroom were bit marked up, could have used coat of paint, but this is ONLY thing I could find! Still very clean. Maintence was around during day, checking pool, ect. Thought needed new lightbulb in lamp in evening, he was there in 5mins even though not on premises. Were doing "work" on upper floor so was upgraded to floor room at no charge and did not hear noises from their construction work either!

Reviews.Title: “Friendly and helpful with questions”
Reviews.Author: Karen A
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at Angel Inn ever since it was built. Great location and friendly staff has made all of our stays enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: “Lucky find!”
Reviews.Author: Ramona W
Reviews.Content: Randomly selected this hotel online and it was a fantastic choice. Friendly employees from the desk to the housekeeeping staff. Clean accommodations, comfortable beds. Always plenty of clean linens and coffee. Very quiet location just off the "strip", easy access to everywhere.Will definitely stay there on our next trip to Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Accommodations at an Affordable Price!”
Reviews.Author: Coeta S
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at Angel Inn In Branson, Missouri on numerous occasions. Rooms are clean, well maintained and comfortable. First visit was pricelined and felt it was a great value. Later pricelined and was not as happy with the experience at other hotels. Now we don't bother with priceline. The few extra dollars (and I do mean FEW) are worth knowing that we are going to be staying in a clean comfortable room with friendly happy staff. Only complaint is the sheets don't fit the beds very good. New, thick pillow-top matresses and older sheets.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: Lana G
Reviews.Content: The rooms are very easy to get to. Pool was nice, hot tub was also nice. Continental breakfast was very good. The staff was very helpful. We would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome hospitality in a great city”
Reviews.Author: garysenior
Reviews.Content: Would have to say i will always stay at angle inn every time i go to branson. It is clean awesome hospitality awesome pool awesome location. Will go back for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Nice”
Reviews.Author: 2shawns
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay. Would stay here agian and would recomed to others! Rooms very comfortable and clean

Reviews.Title: “Always a Nice Stay”
Reviews.Author: VacationsForMe2
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have stayed at this hotel probably a dozen times or so in the past few years when we come to Branson. We keep coming back because we are always pleased with the comfortable and clean rooms, nice quick breakfast, friendly staff, awesome price all year round, and off 76 hwy location. Everything is always above standard and we appreciate that so much. We recommend it!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay!”
Reviews.Author: Phyllis B
Reviews.Content: My DD was a little apprehensive when she saw the pink exterior, but quickly changed her mind when she saw the interior. The beds were very comfortable. But our favorite was the shower, excellent water pressure :). We stayed 5 nights and would definetly recommend this hotel to friends and family. We only found time to use the pool and hot tub one day, but it was very nice. They did receive tornado damage, but they are working hard to get back to normal. We also appreciated the breakfast they had, would've enjoyed some yogurt and bananas though. We really liked the location! It was very easy to get where we wante to go from he. A very reasonably priced and comfortable stay!

Reviews.Title: “awesome stay!!”
Reviews.Author: pat c
Reviews.Content: My mother and I recently spent 4 nights at the Angel Inn and are already planning on spending 5 nights next year. We came less than a week after the tornado had caused damage to one of their buildings. They put us in another room so our trip went without a hitch. The beds are super comfortable, rooms spacious with fridge and microwave. awesome bathroom. all the employees were super nice and helpful. we enjoyed the free breakfast every morning. Their location is perfect for tourists. Room rate was excellent also.

Reviews.Title: “Nice clean place to say”
Reviews.Author: Gary46MS
Reviews.Content: We are enjoying our time at the Angel Inn -- nice comfortable beds, extremely clean rooms and the grounds are well kept.

Reviews.Title: “This place is Heavenly!”
Reviews.Author: adnilnosnhoj
Reviews.Content: Sorry for the pun, but I couldn't resist, especially when its the truth. My sons and I stayed at Angel Inn for spring break, which happened to be just three weeks after the tornado hit, leaving one of Angel's Inn's building without a roof. At first, I was concerned that the noise from the construction would ruin our stay, but we never heard a sound from them, or from our neighbors in the room next door for that matter. By the time we left, it appeared that the roof had been replaced so I'm sure the hotel will have all there rooms available in no time. As for the rooms, that is what impressed me the most with Angel Inn. In most hotels anymore, they put the cheapest possible furniture they could find in their rooms; well all I can say is if this was the cheapest furniture Angel Inn could find, they found themselves a GREAT deal! It really makes me feel as if they see me a guest, not a body with a credit card. Also, the rooms are noticeably larger than other hotels and if you are traveling with kids, that extra foot or so makes a HUGE difference! The indoor pool is a bit on the small side, but I found it to be a few degrees warmer then most other hotel pools and the hot tub was set to a very comfortable temperature as well. The breakfast has the basics and the dining area is kept very clean all morning long. Before I left, I made arrangements for our next stay and can't wait to come back. I would (and have been) recommending this hotel to anyone looking for a quiet, affordable hotel that is just off the strip.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Time”
Reviews.Author: momof5girls63
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Angel Inn last week for 3 days over spring break. The room was very clean, big fridge and very quiet. Great free breakfast too and clean pool. It's our 3rd time there and would recommend it to everyone. Great location being on the back roads and not fighting 76 traffic. Very friendly staff. Affordable and we've stayed at lots of hotels in Branson. Highly recommend this one!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great place, great people, and great service!”
Reviews.Author: Ldiggs67
Reviews.Content: Had a great stay. They were very pleasant. The rooms were clean and smell good. Have nothing bad to say about this place. Very pleased!

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and nice”
Reviews.Author: Dunnoaname
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at the Angel Inn on more than one occasion when visiting Branson. The staff is super friendly and helpful, the cost is affordable, the rooms are spacious and nice, the indoor pool/spa area is a great retreat no matter what the weather is like, and the complimentary morning breakfast helps start your day out right! It's located just off of the 76 strip so it's easy access to the strip without being right on the road with the busy traffic. I'd recommend it and I will definitely stay there again while visiting Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Lucky Find”
Reviews.Author: Beryl M
Reviews.Content: Decided to take a short out of season break just to get away for a few days, surfed the web for some ideas for our stay in Branson, could not have worked out better, the Angel Inn just caught our eye and as it happens was a great find, reception on booking in, friendly staff, room very comfortable, clean bed and bedding and the pillows welcoming at the end of the day , room staff did a great job, all through our four day visit. The location is just right for eateries, entertainments and sight seeing on the Strip

Reviews.Title: “A GREAT place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Lana M
Reviews.Content: This Inn is awesome!! We went in the off season, got our pick of rooms, a great rate and a super pool & spa. The rooms really were the best we've had anywhere. The pillow top beds and extra fluffy pillows, along with super quiet h-a/c units helped me sleep better than I had in weeks. We had a pleasant swim and a super relaxing soak in the best hot tub I've been in since my own. A wonderful continental breakfast-the biscuits & gravy were as good as I serve at my cafe. We have found a new "favorite place" in Branson and not only will we be back, but have flyers in our store in Cape Fair to give to travelers on thier way to Branson. We look forward to the next time!

Reviews.Title: “wonderful stay”
Reviews.Author: abby1958
Reviews.Content: The people at the front desk were so very friendly and helpful. We enjoyed our stay and would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Make sure you get a ground floor room unless you like to climb stairs”
Reviews.Author: preach7
Reviews.Content: We went to Branson during the off season. I had seen rooms on the Web for Angel Inn for $49.99. When I got to the motel I asked for a room for 2 nights & was quoted a price of $70 per night. When I mentioned the web, I was told I could get an room for $49 if I climbed 1 flight of stairs. They charged my debit card for 2 nights. I found out {too late} that that if I parked further away I would only climb 1 flight but in front of my room would be 2 flights. I really didn't understand when the motel was almost empty & no, there were not any buses staying. I have stayed at this motel many times before and never had this problem. I passed many rooms, ground level & empty, with the curtains opened, that my husband & I could have stayed in.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Staff.”
Reviews.Author: mark M
Reviews.Content: We had a Birthday party for our 6 year old. The room and pool area were clean and well kept. The staff knew ahead of time our plans to have the Birthday party and were cheerful and friendly. This is the off season and we are locals. Angel Inn had the best pricing and were willing to allow us to have the party even though the Inn could not have been making much money from a setup like ours. Indoor heated pool was a big plus for the kids. Thank You Angel Inn..

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful!!!”
Reviews.Author: Peggy G
Reviews.Content: I would highly recommend this to all travelers. The staff were wonderful and very helpful. We, as usual, requested that our rooms not be cleaned as I would prefer to do it myself. When we requested clean towels from the housekeeping staff, they also offered additional supplies (coffee, toilet tissue, soap, etc.). This is usually not the case as you have to request all additional supplies. This was such a plus for me. All staff (front desk, housekeeping) were truly helpful. Would definitely recommend and will stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: illinoisrob
Reviews.Content: very nice place rooms very clean nice location nice people to work with wood stay here again

Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean, reasonable”
Reviews.Author: catknob
Reviews.Content: For a girls' weekend in Branson, we requested two adjoining rooms and were pleased with the accomodations. The rooms were clean, AND there was a microwave and refrigerator in each room. It's within walking distance of Andy Williams Moon River Theater, and off the busy Hwy 76, so a perfect location! I'd stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice motel, close to everything”
Reviews.Author: Gingertn
Reviews.Content: We went to Branson, Mo. in Sept. 2011. We stayed at the Angel Inn. It was very clean, and beds were comfy. We asked for a room on the lower level because of walking up the stairs. We stayed 2 nights and we would book at this motel again. It was close to everything, and in a good location.

Reviews.Title: “Great value!”
Reviews.Author: Karen R
Reviews.Content: We just visited Branson for Fall break, staying 2 nights, and had a wonderful stay. Room was clean and comfortable. Breakfast was good. Refrigerator and microwave were a plus. A great value!

Reviews.Title: “Much better on our first visit”
Reviews.Author: DaveSpringHill_FL
Reviews.Content: When I booked this hotel, I specifically requested a first-floor room because my wife has knee problem so it's painful for her to climb stairs. I was told they had no problem with doing this. When we arrived, we were given a room on the SECOND floor when our choices were to climb the stairs or walk a long way around to get to our room. I told the somewhat uncaring girl at the desk I saw only a few cars in the parking lots so there were LOT of room available. She would not budge. Since I was tired from driving all day, I agreed to try the room. Big mistake. Besides being difficult to get to, the AC thumped all night long so i got very little sleep. The next day I went to the desk to tell them our problems. There was a different girl on duty. She CHEERFULLY gave us a FIRST FLOOR room exactly as we had requested in the first place. However, we had to move all our luggage etc ourselves as no help was offered. So why were there a ton of room available on Tuesday but none on Monday ? IMHO because the first girl just didn't want to be bothered with it (or us). The second room was fine. I noticed the WIFI was better than it had been in June when we were there. At that time, they had no Internet connection for over a day. It still disconnected very quickly, but something is better than nothing ! In June we were made to feel welcome; this time we made to feel like we were a bother. I think maybe next time we'll stay somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay.”
Reviews.Author: 71_tom_71
Reviews.Content: We had another nice stay at the Angel Inn. The rooms were clean and comfortable. The indoor pool was a bit on the chilly side. We weren't able to eat at the breakfast as it was very full with people so we had to go somewhere else to eat. Very nice hotel overall.

Reviews.Title: “Clean but not connected”
Reviews.Author: boheme1959
Reviews.Content: Stayed here on my recent trip to Branson and found the rooms to be clean and the bed very comfortable. On our return to our room in the evenings we were without wi-fi , went to the desk the following morning and the clerk said they would report it. Returning to our room later in the day we were pleased to have it working again only to go to a show that evening and returning to no wi-fi. Same thing the next day. The desk clerk was very kind and appologetic and and the same situation accured , wi-fi in the afternoon and none at night. Day 3 everthing went well, Did not use the hot tub , the sign said over 12 yrs only but it was full of fully dressed kids. If you just need a clean, comfortable room to sleep in the Angel Inn is a great deal.

Reviews.Title: “We wish we could have stayed another week!!!”
Reviews.Author: Adkhs3333
Reviews.Content: We stayed for a week in May and it was a great place to stay! The indoor pool area was wonderful and service was very good. Excellent rates... very comfortable!!! Ticket service was prompt and right to the hotel! We wish we could have stayed another week!!! (I've attached the only pictures that came out of the Angel Inn. Interior photos were lost... Sorry!)

Reviews.Title: “TERRIBLE- Room stunk of smoke!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Alicia P
Reviews.Content: As soon as we opened the door to our room we were greeted with a smell of smoke even though it was a non-smoking room. Called the front desk and they wouldn't give us another room. My daughter's asthma was kicking in after being in there only a few minutes with the door opened. They told us they had a machine they could bring over to get the smell out. If that was the case, why was it not already in there after the cleaning crew cleaned it. As strong as it was, you can't tell me they didn't smell it. This whole ordeal made us late to our show & made us completely miss the pre-show. We immediately checked out & went to another hotel. Not happy customers with Angel Inn at all!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “EXCELLENT!!”
Reviews.Author: DonIvey
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent place to stay. First class in all respects. Reasonable rates. We have stayed in much more expensive places not as nice. Off the main drag which makes it less congestive and more quiet. We will always stay at this motel when we come to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Location, Location and Value”
Reviews.Author: TravlingBard
Reviews.Content: From the attentive service, to the clean rooms and pillow top beds that were very comfy, this was a great pick. But when we realized that we could walk to one of the greatest shows (Fercos Brothers, HIGHLY recommended, take the tiger tour afterward too), we were delighted. Its central location made it so much easier to get around and be on time to where we wanted to go. Did not make it to breakfast but the pool and hot tub were crystal clear and perfect temps. Towels in the pool area, and lots of seating for relaxing indoors and since it's open until 11pm that makes it possible to submerge in the hot-tub before a great night's rest. Wal-Mart is also very close and since there is a frigerator in the room, and a microwave, one could save by eating in the room or by the pool with one's own food.

Reviews.Title: “vacation”
Reviews.Author: Dave W
Reviews.Content: Very clean and comfortable beds. Hotel staff,including housekeeping where very friendly and helpful.Reasonable rate.Would definitely recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “ANNIVERSARY”
Reviews.Author: Fred R
Reviews.Content: My wife and I arrived at 0230 to find that the night clerk was willing to show us to our room. Dolly was fantastic the next morning in helping me get flowers for my wife for our 1st anniversary which was on the 10th. We had a lovely stay and the room and rate was fantastic. The staff went beyond most higher quality hotels and their staff to make our anniversary perfect. They are fantastic and the top rated in my eyes for the Branson area. God bless them all and THANK YOU from the bottom of my heart for all that you did for us. WE WILL SEE YOU AGAIN SOON!!!!. Fred and Linda

Reviews.Title: “We will stay here again next year!”
Reviews.Author: sandra s
Reviews.Content: Very clean and very comfortable beds. Our room was very quiet. Nice breakfast in the morning. Excellent location just off main street where shows are. We could avoid heavy traffic via two other routes. Helpful friendly staff. We would definitely recommend this motel to friends.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Sam-Jackie
Reviews.Content: Very clean and comfortable. Quite and conviently located. The complimentary breakfast buffet was fresh and good and the staff was extremely friendly. The price was very reasonable. Highly recommend to anyone not requiring 5 star accommadations but wanting a very nice place to stay during their vacation to Branson. Have paid alot more for rooms that were not even close to being as nice as the one we stayed in at the Angel Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay while in Branson”
Reviews.Author: craymond99
Reviews.Content: The Angel inn is a great place to stay when visiting Branson. It is nothing fancy but is very clean, big rooms and an extremely friendly staff. It is centrally located just off the strip about half way between where the shows and attractions are. Being just off the strip makes it easy to get to things and is very quiet. It also, has an indoor pool and hot tub. The beds are very comfortable. The price is excellent . The free breakfast is very good with eggs, biscuits and gravy, french toast, donuts, bagels, fruit,cereal, coffee , tea, and orange juice. I would rate it an excellent choice and will stay there again on my next visit. I recommend you try it.

Reviews.Title: “Another awesome stay!!”
Reviews.Author: blakewhite23
Reviews.Content: We ventured to Branson again on July 2011 and chose again to stay at Angel Inn. The rates were very reasonalble at I think about $70 a night, not bad for the summer time. We were very pleased once again with the hotel, the staff, the breakfast. The staff was very nice and accomodating, we usually come into Branson during the late evening time and I always contact the hotel to inform them that it will be usually around 9 p.m. when we arrive and as always it is no problem, they always tell me that they will see us when we get there. the rooms are so nice here, each room has a mini fridge, microwave. The beds are super comfortable and we have a little one that sleeps in a pack n play and there is plenty of room either between the two queens or next to the bed by the table and door to put it. we have stayed here at least 5 times and have never had a bad experience. Always pleased each time we stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Definately on my list of favorites”
Reviews.Author: vetteset_93
Reviews.Content: This is one of those little gems in Branson. From Check-in to Check-out, we were treated as if we were the #1 priority for the staff. Room was clean and fresh with plenty of pillows and towels. The front desk staff were smiling and friendly during the check in process and it's so good to see people who are actually happy to be there to serve you. With a location just off the strip (76 Boulevard) this place was perfect for us and was so very quiet and peaceful. We will definately stay there again! Highly recommended and very reasonably priced.

Reviews.Title: “Good Beds”
Reviews.Author: 1ScubaDiver
Reviews.Content: We got this because it had good beds - and it does. But the other amenities such a good breakfast isn't!!!!!!! French toast is some bread that they just warm up - taste nothing like french toast. Same for the eggs, probable some frozen precooked egg made like a pancake. Tastless!! Another irritation is that every time one turns off the computer, one has to sign in again! Service is excellent. Prices were a reasonable $55/night.

Reviews.Title: “Will Stay Again..”
Reviews.Author: Jackson52248
Reviews.Content: We were only staying one night with a busy 2 day itinerary, so this was pretty much just a place to sleep and have breakfast. But we found our room to be clean and comfortable and everything was in good working order. All contacts with staff, either by phone prior to our arrival or after check-in revealed them to be pleasant and friendly, and they genuinely seemed to have our satisfaction as their goal. We originally planned to use the indoor pool / hot tub, but time did not permit. However, we did check out the area and found it to be clean, well kept, and fully operational. Our room was a ground floor unit near the pool and we enjoyed the convenience of being able to load/unload our car very close to our room. Although we did not have occasion to use the fridge or microwave microwave on this trip, they would certainly be a plus on an extended stay. Good location - near Hwy 76 - Wal-Mart is just around the corner for anything you forgot to pack. Breakfast was adequate and included but was not limited to French toast, scrambled eggs, fruit, cereals, donuts, and the usual drinks. The room pricing is quite reasonable and offers excellent value. We look forward to returning for a longer stay.

Reviews.Title: “I know where my Family will be staying on our next trip to Branson”
Reviews.Author: dwright50
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very clean and comfortable. An outstanding value. The staff goes out of their way to make you feel at home. Will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “VERY NICE -COMFORTABLE- CLEAN- FRIENDLY STAFF”
Reviews.Author: marci477
Reviews.Content: We really like everything about this place but one thing which after two nights caused us to move on. The room was clean and comfortable. The breakfast free and a good assortment of foods of good quality. Good location close to stores and Branson shows. The only issue we had was that the room air conditioner was so loud when clicking on during the night it woke us up numerous times. There was NO constant fan switch on the airconditioner and the airconditioner turned on and off automatically. When it went off it was dead quiet but when it came on it was a loud start. It was too hot to turn it off completely. Talked to another vacationer who said there's was the same. If you are a light sleeper please check it out before you stay. Otherwise, we enjoyed our stay at Angel Inn. Standard microwave and frige in room. The entire place was clean, well cared for, and the staff friendly and helpful. They even have an area where you can print out your boarding passes. Clearly management is very good and they know how to make your stay pleasant. Also, you can't beat the price and have the same quality.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hospitality - Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: Madera77
Reviews.Content: Convenient location - clean and comfortable - very pleasant and helpful staff - yummy breakfast - felt like we had "come home" to mom's! Simple, yet elegant in a "common way." Of course life is about perspectives - for us, all of our needs were met - and the indoor swimming pool and hot tub, were nicely maintainted!

Reviews.Title: “Clean enough I walked around barefoot!”
Reviews.Author: Angela B
Reviews.Content: We were trying to save some money so I did some homework and Angel Inn had rave reviews. I would give it a 9.8 on a scale of 1-10. The breakfast was so, so. Plenty of seats, but main hot item was biscuits and gravy. Not into gravy, and biscuits didn't taste too great with just jelly. As for everything else, it was perfect. Room was very clean, mattress clean, bathroom impressively clean. Nice beds, good tv, fairly quiet, pool small but very clean. Staff was wonderful. Location nice but tricky to find at first. Turn by the McDonalds. I would totally stay here again. It passed our picky test...and trust me, we are very picky. We check beds very carefully.

Reviews.Title: “Great place for cheap price”
Reviews.Author: Cfreeland
Reviews.Content: This place had great views of the rolling hills but you were right in town. Breakfast was nice too. The beds were very comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “We loved the BEDS and we will be back!!!”
Reviews.Author: Patty B
Reviews.Content: If you are online and looking for a "GREAT" hotel, look no further! SERVICE: 5 STARS I found it on the web and called to make reservations, Valerie(hostess) was very helpful in answering my questions and offering us choices too! Our breakfast was enough for a "GOOD" start in your day! Waitress was keeping everything clean and full of HOT food! Upon check out, we met Daniel...full of positive attitude and SMILES! ROOM: 5 STARS Our room was "VERY CLEAN", we know that Branson gets a lot of traffic in hotels and ours was immaculate! (something to write home about!) The bed was "OUTSTANDING"!!!We like having a full bar size frig and microwave too! Great shower too! Having the extras in room, lightened the packing load! POOL/SPA: 5 STARS---clean and temp. just right! Definitely our winter hideout! LOCATION: 5 STARS too! What are you waiting for...BOOK IT!

Reviews.Title: “Friendliest staff in Branson”
Reviews.Author: Ryasa
Reviews.Content: The Angel Inn is spotlessly clean, the staff are beyond helpful and the location while a little steep is very convenient. We had some issues with our booking, and the Ladies at the front desk went out of their way to make our stay easier. They also answered off the beaten path tourism questions without a problem (we were looking for a hiking trail). We were given clear concise directions for taking alternate routes rather than congested main routes. Everyone we encountered at the Angel Inn was pleasant and polite, even asking if we had noticed any maintenance issues.

Reviews.Title: “We truly loved it & would go back!”
Reviews.Author: rschroeder_11
Reviews.Content: This place is very clean & quiet. We stayed in a room close to the pool, but never heard any noise coming from the pool. The rooms were very clean & the beds were very comfortable. This hotel was located in a great place, convenient to the strip. I liked the service, friendly staff and continental breakfast. The indoor pool was to cold for me, wish it was heated. The hot tub was great!

Reviews.Title: “Very disappointing and will never stay again.”
Reviews.Author: Ray1226
Reviews.Content: We were on a family mini-vacation and looking at the reviews I thought this would be a good place to stay but was I mistaken. We had to lug stuff up 3 flights of outdoor stairs, rooms were small, ugly bedspreads (looked dirty), carpet dirty, no shampoo (good thing I packed some) and no soap for shower except for a dumb thing on the wall. When I look at the other reviews I wonder why they liked it so much. The breakfast was very average and that is giving it a compliment. The bananas were so ripe it was comical. I do not normally comment on hotels but this was not a good experience. We were glad to leave and glad to go to another hotel which cost more but was definitely worth it!! We will not be back.

Reviews.Title: “room was okay for the price”
Reviews.Author: levicolt
Reviews.Content: check in was fast and friendly, room was okay for the price room was clean but the carpet was a little dirty, fan on ac didn't stay on made it hard sleeping.

Reviews.Title: “very nice & comfortable. will be back.”
Reviews.Author: william k
Reviews.Content: This was our third time to stay and as usual found the room clean, nicely furnished and the grounds clean and neat. The breakfast was all that you could asked for.

Reviews.Title: “Bugs in our room, bad experience”
Reviews.Author: John D
Reviews.Content: I never write reviews on websites but usually look online to read reviews. But I felt I needed to write this to inform future vacationers of our stay at the Angel Inn. We decided to go to Branson for the weekend and have not been there in a long time. We booked a package deal online that included 2 nights at the Angel Inn. I read the reviews on this sight and was encouraged that it would be a great place to stay. We have 2 small daughters and got a room with two queen beds. Upon arriving, I asked the boy at the front desk where a good place to eat dinner was. He said he really didn't know, that he "hasn't eaten anywhere in Branson". Huh? anyway, we got our keys and went to our room. While it it didn't look great, I've seen worse. However, besides the main comforter (that I usually avoid using in hotels) there were no other blankets. Also (and this may be small) but there were no bottles of shampoo in the bathroom, just a big dispenser mounted on the shower wall. But none of these were the deciding factor in us leaving and getting another hotel after one night in the Angel Inn. The deciding factor was the two large bugs we saw under the sheets of one of the beds. This was not well received by my daughters or my wife. After asking the front desk to make it better and getting no help and then them refusing to give us a refund, we cut our losses and went to another hotel, which we enjoyed very much. So, hopefully our bad experience can help you from making a bad decision.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: supermom52
Reviews.Content: This hotel was selected for us by the time-share place that roped us into a 2 hour presentation, so I was not sure what we were getting. Turned out better than expected. Centrally located. The room was large. Thankfully the air cond. worked great, as it is VERY hot in MO in July! Pool and hot tub rather small. Breakfast good. Stayed 5 nights, and the room was cleaned up nicely every day while we were out. Would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Very Disappointed”
Reviews.Author: eyeore6936
Reviews.Content: When I paid with cash for my hotel room at Angel Inn in Branson they told me I needed to pay a $25.00 deposit because I paid in cash. I gave the man, who was extremely rude, $40.00 and he gave me $15.00 change. He told me I would get the $25.00 back the next day when I checked out if all was well. The next day I went to check out and was told that he gave me too much change the day before. I explained that I gave him $40 and he gave me $15 change and that was correct. Then I was told that if they gave me the $25.00, which by the way was still in the sealed envelope that the man the day before had me put it in, then his drawer would be short $20.00 and he would get in trouble so would I just take the $5.00 so he wouldn't get in trouble. I am not sure how his drawer being $20.00 short became my responsibility but after discussion with the lady behind the counter I did not get the $20.00 I only received $5.00 of my deposit back. I will not stay in this hotel again and my wife who travels to Branson often to see her daughter will never stay there again and she always stayed there. It is sad that someone can short change the company the work for and make their customers responsible to cover the employees butt. Very sad indeed. Good luck to you if you treat all of your customers the way I was treated you are a sad bunch of people. I wish you luck in the future because with this business ethic you will need it. Thank you for reminding me that the business are in it for themselves and to hell with the customers. May I suggest that you look at your security tapes and make sure the customer is wrong before taking the money that is due them.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT STAY, WILL RETURN”
Reviews.Author: wellchosen
Reviews.Content: Great rooms, iron, ironing board, coffee w/machine, fridge, micro oven, pillow top on King Size bed. Towels changed daily, AC kept room really cool. Breakfast was of a great variety, what was supposed to be hot, was, cold was cold, cereal, donuts, bagels, fruit salad, nanners, juices, coffee. Staff was polite, willing to help. Other guests should try to smile, hard to eat with crabby faces. Met some nice ones though. Centrally located, easy in, easy out. Instant hot water, good showers, and cable TV. A very good stay, look forward to next time.

Reviews.Title: “Angel Inn - okay stay”
Reviews.Author: cherichrissy
Reviews.Content: I recently visited this hotel with my husband last week. When we got into town a little early (2:15 - 2:30) we were told that the room wasn't ready. Check in isn't until 3:00 and beings it is HOT out the maids were running a little behind. Well IT'S been HOT everywhere this summer, whatever. So we ended up going to get something too eat. Finally came back at 4:00 and was able to get into our room. It is a standard room, nothing fancy. The beds were soft and comfortable. Then only i didn't like was the soap they provide in the bathroom, it's liquid. The next day we left early to meet family and do a day at Silver Dollar City, got back to the room around 4:30 and the maids were just finishing cleaning our room. Kinda late to be cleaning a room if you ask me. The other thing about the service of this hotel is if you don't pick everything up off your bed they won't make up the bed. They won't touch or clean anything that has a personnal beloning on it. I suppose that accounts for anything that would come up missing. The breakfast they offered did not look good to me so we passed. But also cause there was nowhere to sit. 2 huge buses had come in and all of those people were down there every morning. We just went out. Overall stay okay for the price. I will try somewhere else next time.

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for.”
Reviews.Author: Hamptons903
Reviews.Content: We booked the Angel Inn as part of a package through Reserve Branson. I chose it because it looked nice enough and was the 3rd or 4th cheapest. My husband and I stayed with our 7, 3 and 1-year-old daughters in a preferred double queen. Pros: Comfortable beds We had a good view as we were on the top floor facing the rear of the property. Convenient location Cons: This is definitely a motel, not a hotel or a resort. Each room exits to the outside, which was a con for me. Don't plan on eating breakfast. One of the reasons I chose this hotel was for the free hot breakfast. Unfortunately, the breakfast was mostly cold, with some "french toast" in a crock pot. I don't know how it tasted because the tiny breakfast room was so full there was no way we could get any food. This blew our budget because we had to eat breakfast out every morning. I wish I would have spent the money on a nicer hotel. Our room was only cleaned one time. I told the person at the front desk because I had to go get clean towels and another pillow because the pillows were bad. She assured me that they would be up to clean it by 6 p.m. They never came. If you just want a comfortable place to lay your head with no frills, this place would be fine. I won't stay again because I just expected more from a vacation.

Reviews.Title: “No Internet”
Reviews.Author: KelliGorman
Reviews.Content: I got tired of going to the front desk all the time asking question such as why are door key didn't work (was not scanned) etc that I just didn't go down there to ask why there internet didn't work. It didn't even show up on my computer. The breakfast was poor but the room was clean. The staff seemed to get tired of my questions but I thought that was what they were there for. If you want the internet don't stay here. They even warned me that their internet was slow.

Reviews.Title: “Nearly walked ourselves to death. WILL NOT BE BACK> Staff unfriendly.”
Reviews.Author: Catspajamas25
Reviews.Content: We were there for a birthday celebration. Suppose to have ground floor rooms, since husband could not walk up stairs. We had to park car in one location and go up a slanting walkway and then down another walk way. (A long ways) When we were checking out, had to block cars and carry bags down and sit on sidewalk because if we didn 't we would have to go the stair route. Were to check in at 3:00. Room was not ready until 3:45. Had to sit and wait. The next day after doing our outing, came back after 3:00 and our room had not been made or cleaned yet. Had to wait another 45 minutes. Were told by desk clerk that they clean check out rooms first. Guess after they get your money, they don't care how they treat you. Maybe they need to get more help to clean the rooms. The room was comfortable, but the window air condition was loud and woke you up each time it cycled on and off.

Reviews.Title: “Loved Our Stay”
Reviews.Author: pblair22
Reviews.Content: We very nuch enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The staff was very kind and helpful. The rooms were very clean, the beds were wonderful to sleep on, and the pool area was very well kept. I would recommend this inn very highly.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean and quiet”
Reviews.Author: TheKlute
Reviews.Content: Had room with King bed. It was comfortable, but not as good as home...but none are right? Have not stayed at many other places in Branson, but this certainly met our needs. Front desk workers were helpful and informative. Pool looked OK but did not use. Wife and I had a relaxed long weekend there and would stay there again if we go back to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel! We will be staying here again!”
Reviews.Author: cujomax
Reviews.Content: My sister recommended this place to us for our trip to Branson. We were very happy with our room. The bed was very comfortable and it was nice to have the fridge and microwave in there, too. The indoor pool was nice. One thing that I really liked having was high chairs in the breakfast area, very handy with a toddler. It is also reasonably priced. We like to stay at 'mom and pop' hotels, and this is great one!

Reviews.Title: “Great, we'll stay agian”
Reviews.Author: turkeyTroyKs
Reviews.Content: The staff was very friendly and accomidating. The room were clean, the pool was nice, and the location was good. Was a little disappointed in the breakfast, but it wouldn't change my veiw of the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “just average, better values around”
Reviews.Author: Wolfie27
Reviews.Content: Good location, not the best price. Check in was a hassle due to surly staff. Wifi is slow to unusable at times. Other hotels in same price range with more amenities. Mattress in our room was old and tired, needed replacement. Bad pillows.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and we'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: LadybugAdy
Reviews.Content: The staff was very nice upon arrival and check in was a breeze! We wasnt expecting the room to be very nice since we got such a great rate, but we were very plesantly suprised! The room was very clean and very big. The bed was very comfortable. The hotel was in the perfect spot. Right by great restraunts and the branson landing was just a quick drive down the road. The breakfast the next morning was very good (french toast, eggs, bagels and 3 different cerals). The only downside I would say was the swimming pool, it was an indoor pool but was not heated so it was VERY cold but our child didnt seem to mind :) We relaxed in the hot tub instead. We will defintaly be back to the Angel Inn on our next trip tp Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Angel Inn”
Reviews.Author: cowloverus
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a motel that had beds that didn't feel like you were sleeping on a slab of concrete. The Angel Inn was great. Besides the beds, the room was great, the staff was great and the entire weeks stay was great. We are hoping to be back in September. Colleen

Reviews.Title: “Awesome !!!!”
Reviews.Author: BetteTrailCreek_In_
Reviews.Content: We had the BEST time at the Angel Inn! My family had never been to Branson and the staff at the Angel Inn were so helpful and courteous. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and will definitely stay there again. The rooms were spotless, the breakfast was terrific. Had a great time.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: ltdavis04
Reviews.Content: I have never taken the time to write a review before. I felt I needed to for everyone like myself who reads them. Me and my two kids 10 and 5 stayed here. This was a great deal!! We really enjoyed our stay! The rooms are clean and the beds are pillow top!!!! The pool area was always clean and the front desk could not have been nicer. It was a great location and a great stay!!!! If ever we are back in Branson we will for sure stay here!

Reviews.Title: “Home away from Home”
Reviews.Author: deblyn626
Reviews.Content: My husband, my 7 yr. old granddaughter and I stayed at Angel Inn for 3 nights earlier this month and we were very comfortable and pleased with our stay. The staff are friendly and accomodating. The rooms are very clean as is the pool area. The breakfast provided was considerable and there was something for everyone to enjoy. If and when we come to Branson again we will have no second thoughts about where we will stay.

Reviews.Title: “Needs carpet shampooing in 1st Floor”
Reviews.Author: lindalou530
Reviews.Content: We spent 2 days at this hotel, and though we liked the ground floor, the carpet in the room was in bad shape, as it needed shampooing bad! The room itself was clean (carpet excluded) and we visited this hotel because it was highly recommended on Trip Advisor. We sure got a let-down, though, as we heard remarks from others there also. We will not stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Exactly as advertised !!!”
Reviews.Author: Almontonions
Reviews.Content: No doubt the best overall deal in Branson. The pillow top beds were extremely comfortable, the rooms well appointed, the staff very friendly, and a great breakfast too! The breakfast did vary each day of our stay and the area was kept well stocked and super clean. Proximity to the Mall (easy walking distance) was fantastic - great free entertainment, beautiful shops, and everything you might need while traveling. The entire property was very clean, and the grounds were being cared for each day. Parking was spacious and you are able to park outside your door if you are on the ground level. The fridge in the room was larger than standard and this worked well for us as we stayed here several days. We didn't use the pool but did enjoy the hot tub more than once. Staff keep a large supply of clean towels and there is excellent supervision as the pool backs onto the office. Free internet service/computer also served us well. If you're looking for a great night sleep, comfortable beds and no noise from other rooms, it is very hard to beat the Angel Inn. We would definitely return !!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Second Time at the Angel Inn - Still a Good Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: KansasTravelnut
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Angel Inn over Memorial Day Weekend in 2009 and really liked the comfort/convenience at a reasonable price, but regretably did not stay here during our trip to Branson last Memorial Day, so we were sure to correct that and booked our room several weeks in advance. When booking the Angel Inn, be sure to book online for the Best Rate but be sure to join the "e-club" as that is the only way to receive the discounted rate. Keep in mind you are NOT paying for the room at the time you book it - you are just making your reservation. We brought some friends with us that had never been to Branson, and they liked the Angel Inn too! Our kids spent time in the indoor pool most afternoons/evenings after returning from Silver Dollar City or a show. The rooms were clean and comfortable and the staff is extremely friendly. While there is a breakfast provided each day, it may not satisfy picky eaters as it is coffee, juice, milk, cereal, donuts, bagels, and one hot item each morning (usually alternates Biscuits and gravy one day and french toast the next). It was fine for us, but it seemed like our friends were not impressed. If we make another trip to Branson next year, we will be sure to stay at the Angel Inn!

Reviews.Title: “It was "ok"”
Reviews.Author: birdamundo
Reviews.Content: We checked in and went to our room....which obviously hadn't been visited yet by housekeeping so i treck back to the front office. They apologize and give me another room which is farther away from pool and NO KIDDING--its dirty as well. At this point my husband is livid and my son with Aspergers is freaking out. I am done. Head to office and manager talks us into staying with a discounted price. It was a great room but i wish the whole experience hadn't started off the way it did.It put a huge damper on the stay.

Reviews.Title: “Okay”
Reviews.Author: IndianaKris
Reviews.Content: We chose the Angel Inn due to it's high ranking on tripadvisor. The hotel advertises the rooms are two feet longer than the average hotel room. Our room was about the same size as other rooms we have stayed in, maybe a bit smaller actually. The bathroom was very small. They advertise the most comfortable beds. My bed was really not very comfortable. The pad kept bunching up underneath me. There was the sound of something strange and very loud in our room...and we could never figure out what it was. IT sounded literally like a jet plane revving up for departure. Mentioned this to the desk..they had no explanation nor an apology. Our room faced the wall of the indoor pool. We could not open our drapes because of lack of privacy. And we paid extra for this DELUXE room. We never used the pool as it was often full of rowdy kids. The towels were very thin. Breakfast was adequate, but not great. Rooms are non-smoking but the smell of smoke was very apparent from people smoking right outside of their room. Parking was very tight and one night we almost could not find a spot at all. On the plus side, the location is just off highway 76 and so a little quieter than being right on the strip. IT is very close to RIDE THE DUCKS. There is a Walmart in walking distance of the hotel and a Panera Bread Restaurant. The outside of the hotel is quite attractive. One staff members was extremely helpful...the others just average. The price was very good. The room seemed clean. The room had a frig/microwave. It is a good value for the money, close to the strip, clean and safe. But I do not think it needs to be rated in the top ten hotels in Branson. But it is an okay place to stay if you are on a budget.

Reviews.Title: “One of our best trips to Branson”
Reviews.Author: Shafter11
Reviews.Content: Despite a rocky start (a car wreck on the way to the airport, but we got there in time), we had a wonderful 11 days in Branson. This was our 9th year in a row, and our 9th stay at the Angel Inn. The location of the motel is wonderful, the rooms are very nice, the staff is terrific, and the orange juice is made from real oranges! The indoor pool and hot tub were really appreciated after getting knocked around in the car wreck. Had to deal with insurance company and auto repair long distance, and the motel staff was a great help with copies and fax. Wonderful motel, Can't wait to go back there next year.

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant, comfortable hotel”
Reviews.Author: JetW4585
Reviews.Content: My husband & I thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Angel Inn. It was very clean. The bed was comfortable. The personnel was friendly & helpful. They also had a really good breakfast. We stayed two nights & the breakfast was different each morning with plenty of variety. We have stayed at several motels in Branson & this was by far the most comfortable, pleasant stay we've had. We'll stay there again & recommend it to our friends.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place.”
Reviews.Author: Sagelobo
Reviews.Content: We stayed here 4 nights. We arrived 1 day earlier than expected; staff was very helpful in adding an additional night with last minute notice. Double queen room was very clean, large had plenty of room. The beds were wonderfully comfortable Breakfast was fine for lighter eaters, Food was well stocked and hot food was hot. I have only one thing I was disappointed with: we booked our rooms 3 months in advance on line for 3 nights. After booking we called the hotel (per instructions on the web site) as we had special needs with small children and needed connecting rooms. The person we spoke with was very helpful and said yes they could accommodate our request. When we checked in our special request for the 3 days was not honored, had we known this we would not have stayed here. Although this caused us some difficulities our stay was nice. I would stay here again if I had no special needs.

Reviews.Title: “Very poor service”
Reviews.Author: SDArt
Reviews.Content: I took my Grandmother to Branson for Mothers Day. I made a reservation on line b/c I had to have a handicap smoking room for my grandma who is in a wheel chair. When we got to the hotel, they had us an upstairs non-smoking room. I was told the mistake was made by Expedia and if I wanted smoking I would have to pay more. We were on a budget so that wasn't possible. They were nice enough to get us a handicap room. My grandmother sit in the door of the room, with the door open, to stay out of the cold and smoked her cigarettes. She blew her smoke out and kept her debris outside at all times. Today, I was just informed that I was charged $180.00, because the room had to be "taken off the market and cleaned thoroughly". My bank account is now in the negative. So much for a Vacation on a Budget.

Reviews.Title: “A good location, worn out rooms”
Reviews.Author: Roaddogflo
Reviews.Content: This was a disappointing room considering the high ratings and reviews I read prior to booking this hotel. Positives: cleanliness, very friendly and helpful staff, wifi, decent breakfast, location. Negatives: extra cost per night for less noisy area of hotel, very worn linens and towels (holes in blankets and bedspreads), stained bathtub (though it was clean).

Reviews.Title: “What a great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: jmhz
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were very impressed with the Angel Inn. The room was very well designed for comfort and ease. The bed was very comfortable and the bathroom well supplied with soft, fluffy towels!! We enjoyed the continental breakfast, particularly the fresh fruit salad. The pool and hot tub were well maintained and added to our relaxing stay! We highly recommend Angel Inn and thank the courteous staff for there attention!! Jan and Dick Zech

Reviews.Title: “Clean, quiet, and close to everything”
Reviews.Author: BlueBioy
Reviews.Content: This was the first time we stayed at Angel Inn. The Staff was really friendly, and the Rooms were really clean and it was so quiet. Could not hear anyone in other rooms. The Beds were really comfortable. We will be staying there again when in Town. Thanks to everyone on the Staff you were really helpful. A. Sciolaro

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay !!”
Reviews.Author: NitaPesata
Reviews.Content: Spent 4 days at the Angel Inn. A spacious clean room with refrig and microwave. A very courtious staff and delious breakfast. I will stay here again the next time in Branspn. Easy access to all routes.

Reviews.Title: “AWESOME PLACE TO STAY.....”
Reviews.Author: Irishrose48
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for our anniversary and was totally pleased...We WILL RETURN again to this hotel...staff was very helpful and friendly, VERY nice and clean rooms, Pool/hot tub area extremely clean and comfortable, breakfast in lobby was good, walking distance to all the stores and fun things to do.....this WILL be the hotel we will stay at for our future visits to Branson...Thanks so much for making our time remediable.....

Reviews.Title: “SPIC AND SPAN CLEAN!!!”
Reviews.Author: jan_mcelyea
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Angel inn the weekend of the 16th of April. We were very pleased with our stay at Angel Inn in Branson. The rooms were very very immmaculate and to travelers, that is a must! Bathroom had a whirlpool tub, but we did not try it out. Next trip we will. We did enjoy the micro fridge and microwave in our rooms. Just a nice option. The staff was very friendly and accomadated us very very well. We had never stayed here before while in Branson, but we made our reservations for our next trip when we left!!!! Very affordable......

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value--Best Night's Sleep EVER!!!”
Reviews.Author: estesla
Reviews.Content: I have nothing negative to say about this hotel! If we ever return to Branson, we WILL stay here again! The room was pretty basic and very clean--but the true treasure of staying at this hotel are the mattresses and pillows! "Angel" Inn says it...you will sleep like an angel on a fluffy cloud--not even kidding! I wanted to strap the mattress to our car before we left! Also, the pool area is very nice and clean--pool is good size. The hot tub was wonderful (no children are allowed in the hot tub.) Breakfast was also good...coffee, juice, cereals, fresh fruit, assorted breads and donuts, boiled eggs, and also a hot item each day (one day it was biscuits and gravy, the next french toast.) The location is great too, just one block from the main strip so it is more quiet and easy to get in and out of easily. Do yourself a favor and stay here!!!

Reviews.Title: “They took care of us.”
Reviews.Author: fireantstx
Reviews.Content: Angel Inn was all more than I expected. The beds were comfortable, the room was clean, the breakfasts were different every day and the indoor pool was perfect. The front desk staff was very accomodating and always smiling, they were always a pleasure to see and always greeted me. One item that is so minor, but very much appreciated is free usage of a computer and printer in the lobby. So many hotels you go to these days charge for this simple item, but not Angel Inn, they provide it free. Printing a ticket confirmation or map was so convienant. Thank you all for a great trip, hope to see you all next year.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place to stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: kimmer2000
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay at the Angel Inn. The location was great just off the main strip but close to everything. The rooms were wonderful, especially the pillowtop beds. The people were wonderful with the exception of one. I wish the hot tub would have been more powerful but it was still nice. Everything was very nice and thank you to the staff.

Reviews.Title: “We loved Angel Inn”
Reviews.Author: busymomcheryl
Reviews.Content: I was traveling with my daughter (13 years old) for a couple of days of relaxation in Branson. I wanted to feel safe and secure and comfortable, without spending a lot of money. I found Angel Inn through priceline. It was exactly what we needed! The beds were very comfortable. The people at the front desk were helpful and helped me find tickets to a show at a discount rate. The breakfast the next morning was good. The room had a refrigerator and a microwave that we didn't use, but we will the next time we visit.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, good location, economical and friendly.”
Reviews.Author: MOmOf3Kids72
Reviews.Content: We were a bit wary since the price was so good and it wasn't a brand name (though it was formerly a Hampton Inn). No worries! Very clean, though basic rooms. Bathroom with toilet and shower a bit small, but manageable. Loved having a microwave and fridge for the leftovers and drinks for family. Breakfast had enough selection of hot and cold for every family member and area was clean. Kids enjoyed the pool, though the pool towels are small. It's a bowl shape and starts at 3' which is deep for the littlest ones. Note that breakfast and pool are in separate building...not bad except that it was raining and cold when we visited. You can easily hear kids running along the outside connecting balconies (including my own), but overall a quiet place just off the strip and convenient to everything. All the staff we talked to were friendly, but the room was made up quite late in the afternoon. We reserved a value room but checked in late and were upgraded to elevator building on south side. Great view and would be pretty when trees bloom or in fall. Appreciated free Wi-Fi as we brought our I-Pad.

Reviews.Title: “Comfy”
Reviews.Author: mozenoze
Reviews.Content: It was very comfortable.The pillow top mattress was really nice.The staff is very friendly and willing to make your stay enjoyable.The only down side was the street noise from Green Mtn. Rd.Overall it was a nice place.

Reviews.Title: “Can't go wrong with this hotel”
Reviews.Author: stew2u
Reviews.Content: Best value in Branson. My wife said she did not want to get out of the bed it was so very comfy. This is the place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel at a good price”
Reviews.Author: Gfay62
Reviews.Content: The Angel Inn was a very clean, updated hotel. The rooms were spacious and the hotel is very well kept. The indoor pool and hottub were great! The breakfast was a little disappointing, but is better then many that we have experienced in the Branson area.

Reviews.Title: “May stay again”
Reviews.Author: mburke2000
Reviews.Content: I would have to say it was an ok stay. The web site said every room get wifi. We tried for about an hour to get a wifi. Could not get signal. I had to use my phone to get tickets. I had the ticket drop off at the front desk. I went up to front desk three time to get them and they said they did not have them. So I call the ticket service. They said they were drop off. I try one last time. The envlope was on the floor the whole time. I would overall say the visit was ok. They just need to keep organized.

Reviews.Title: “Out of Season Stay”
Reviews.Author: Sportstravel01
Reviews.Content: Wonderful stay! Extremely clean rooms, very quiet, could not hear anyone in adjoining rooms. Beds are very comfortable w/very soft linens. Convenient location to 76 and stores/restaurants. Staff was excellent with my group. Have stayed in many hotels in Branson, I'll return here again!

Reviews.Title: “I would stay again.”
Reviews.Author: busy_ones
Reviews.Content: I chose the Angel Inn because of the good reviews on tripadvisor.com. I was in Branson for a business meeting and many of the other hotels in the area were not open due to the time of year. We were pleased with our room. It was very clean, the furnishings were in good condition and the bed was comfortable. The staff was very friendly and helpful. It was also convenient to the meeting location.

Reviews.Title: “Trying hard to provide value...”
Reviews.Author: Tatumrancher
Reviews.Content: Very comfortable bed. The room was clean, but old and somewhat outdated We just needed a place to sleep...fortunately because the facility is pretty tired. The staff was very helpful. The motel is basic lodging at best.

Reviews.Title: “Very neat and clean!”
Reviews.Author: VanessaA32
Reviews.Content: The front desk was very helpful and friendly. As soon as we opened the room door, we smelled cleanness, very nice. Room was spotless. Beds are pillow top, and pillows are so nice! Pool area very clean and warm! This was our second time there, and the first visit was just as nice as the second! Will definatley be back again! Oh, and rates are VERY reasonable too.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Value and Great Amenities!”
Reviews.Author: Vulky
Reviews.Content: This is a great place to stay - nice clean rooms, indoor pool, hot continental breakfast and more at a great price. We were just looking for a reasonably priced place to stay and were pleasently surprised at everything we got for one of the best prices in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Best time ever.”
Reviews.Author: colton05
Reviews.Content: THis was the 2nd time that we stayed at the Angel Inn. Both my husband and myself enjoyed our stay very much. The staff was very courteous and friendly. There was always a smile on their face. We will definitely return. We have recommended the Angel Inn to our co-workers.

Reviews.Title: “Great Room Great Value”
Reviews.Author: 256fred
Reviews.Content: Really enjoyed staying here. It is at the heart of everything Branson. The value was excellent. Hot breakfasts every morning. Really loved the Cinnamon French Toast. Far enough from strip to be really quiet.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable Room and Great Location”
Reviews.Author: bmcdon
Reviews.Content: Our room was large with a table, 2 chairs , small fridge and a microwave. We had a king size pillow top bed that was extremely comfortable. The heat is individually controlled as would be the air conditioner.The breakfast was included and there was lots of variety. There is an indoor pool and hot tub close to the office. The inn is 2 stories and we were able to be on the ground floor parked right in front of our room. This was most convenient as we had lots to carry in. The ice and drink machines were close by. It is in a great location within walking distance to a large grocery store, walmart and restaurants. The receptionist was most helpful and we would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “very pleased”
Reviews.Author: tgad
Reviews.Content: rooms were nice, clean and nice amenities. beds were great with nice pillows too.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: EKC59
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a two queen bed room. The room had ample space and was clean. The pool and hot tub were very nice. The breakfast was great!!! The staff were very helpful and friendly. I can't believe how inexpensive it was to stay there for such great accommodations.

Reviews.Title: “Will stay there every time I go to Branson.”
Reviews.Author: cathleenflint
Reviews.Content: Very clean rooms, very friendly and respectful staff, great breakfast, great rates and great location! It's not on the main drag, but close enough! More than two options of rooms available. The rooms must be sound proof because I didn't hear the children next door unless I was outside of our room. Also, had a smoking area designated on the floor.

Reviews.Title: “Good Service”
Reviews.Author: Waymon_10
Reviews.Content: Robbie was very accommodating. She helped us with the shows we wanted to see and made sure that everything was O.K. in our room.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: MMClark
Reviews.Content: Angel Inn is a great place to stay, we highly recommend this motel. The rooms are very clean, the rooms smell clean, and the beds are very comfortable. Our room had two queen-size beds, a mini-fridge, and a microwave. This motel is worth staying at. The next time we stay in Branson, the Angel Inn will be our first choice.

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: sab2006
Reviews.Content: the room was very clean we go to branson 4 times a year and angel inn was the best

Reviews.Title: “clean, comfortable and great location”
Reviews.Author: judyp1414
Reviews.Content: Would stay here again with everything being positive! The only downside would be that you have to go to another building to swim which would be hard in cold weather. We loved the easy access into and out of the motel. Did not hear any neighbors and was quiet at night. Close access to everything----we found our "go to" motel in Branson!

Reviews.Title: “A Treasure!”
Reviews.Author: retiredandlovingit07
Reviews.Content: I chose the Angel Inn based on reviews on tripadvisor.com and we have NOT been disappointed! The gals at the front desk were very welcoming and provided us with every bit of knowledge of the area that we were seeking. They also provided us with a service that helps you secure show tickets and delivers them right to the hotel. The rooms are large and the beds are comfortable. It is in a quiet, off the main street location, and although most rooms are filled by guests from tour buses, it's so quiet you wouldn't know they're here! The continental breakfast offers fruit, cereal, hard-boiled and scrambled eggs, French toast, coffee, and juice and is served from 6:30-9:30.
