The guests from the buses were there in numbers, but pool-side seating provides additional room to sit and eat. The room prices are quite competitive, and I know we'll return!

Reviews.Title: “Functional”
Reviews.Author: KatieScarlettO
Reviews.Content: The Angel Inn is an older motel that could use some sprucing up - but its clean and the front desk staff couldn't be nicer. Fo the price I paid I was a bit disappointed in the quality of the place. The bedspreads are definitely old style and just old, the door to my room was rotting at the corners, and because it's an exterior entrance style motel you can't leave your curtains open so it's just dark. Branson caters to the elder crowd and this hotel is definitely geared towards that demographic also. On this particular road trip I stayed in 5 different hotels/motels all in the same price range - this was the most disappointing. But - I will repeat - it was clean and the staff was nice and friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: ddndoug
Reviews.Content: This hotel was very clean and in a great location. Near the strip, but not right on it. Easy access to everything. Indoor pool and hot tub were very nice. Good continental breakfast and friendly staff. Would definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Well Managed and Pleasant.”
Reviews.Author: lyteman47
Reviews.Content: Staff is very attentive to your needs. Robbie greeted us upon arrival and made us feel welcomed. Our room was very tidy and clean. The beds were the "ultimate of comfort" for a rewarding sleep. Very efficient maid service. The location was ideal for our shows we selected. Using the yellow route was our main ticket home "Angel Inn" while we were there. Breakfast was typical, however you can walk up the hill to McD's if it isn't to you liking. And Walmart is there too making it very convenient. This is a nice hotel and one that we would quickly return to anytime while in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “They don't come any cleaner than the Angel Inn and theyare nice too.”
Reviews.Author: jschull147
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a clean place to stay in Branson centrally located and friendly and fun staff, then this is the place. Ihave traveled all over this country and the world having spent 23 years in the Army and have never found a staff more friendly and rooms so clean for the value. I will stay there on my next trip to Branson. The only doen side is the towels are a little ruff, but the FREE breakfast is good and the coffee is great. A must stay.

Reviews.Title: “Angel Inn is a great place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: tukalota
Reviews.Content: The Angel Inn is not on congested Hwy 76. It is just south of the strip which gives it a great location. I made our reservations 2 weeks in advance. When we arrived we were told we didn't have a reservation. I had my confirmation number. Turns out there was a mix up on what our arrival date was. The hotel had us down for the day before, so when we didn't show up, not only was our remaining reservation (4 nights) cancelled, we were also charged for the night we weren't there. I spoke with the manager, Lois, & explained what I had reserved. She couldn't have been nicer. She found us another room, with our same requests (2 beds, n/s, elevator. etc.), for the next 5 days. She also took off the charge for the night we weren't there. Our room was very clean, the mattresses were new 'pillow tops' & extremely comfortable. The drapery blocked out the morning sun. The hot breakfast each morning in the lobby was great. We will definitely stay there again the next time we go to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: JWM-AR
Reviews.Content: The rooms were clean. The beds were wonderfully comfortable. The TV' needed to be upgraded but still had a great picture. Breakfast had cereal, biscuits, gravy, boiled eggs, coffee, juice, and toast.

Reviews.Title: “maintenance needed”
Reviews.Author: 1sadie15
Reviews.Content: The drain of the sink wasn't working, nor the hairdryer, and the electrical outlet was very very loose. We also had a problem with the keycards. After advising the office all items were repaired right away.

Reviews.Title: “Great Rooms very spacious. Enjoyed the Hot Tub”
Reviews.Author: Coachlite
Reviews.Content: Rooms were very clean, quiet, beds and pillows were wonderful. Highly recommend this hotel to all. Very Clean. Staff very courteous.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome”
Reviews.Author: Cindy497
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful time. I was traveling with my elderly mother and the staff was great. We needed a late check out and they accomadated us with no problems. Also ground floor rooms were great. Thanks for a great weekend.

Reviews.Title: “A nice place to stay that doesn't cost you an arm and a leg.”
Reviews.Author: koltonsmawmaw
Reviews.Content: The Angel Inn is perfectly located. It is close enough to all the shows and eating places without being right on the "strip". The rooms were very clean and tended to daily. We never had to ask for anything. With breakfast being served at the Inn there was no need to get in your car and go somewhere each morning to eat. I am certain that we will be staying at the Angel Inn again on our next trip tp Branson.

Reviews.Title: “you get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: chrisbigforkmt
Reviews.Content: We chose this hotel based on others rave reviews. Keep in mind that there's over 100 rooms, so it doesn't feel cozy or friendly. Our room was in the furthest building, and wasn't even made up when we returned after lunch the next day. We had to drive to the breakfast room (our room was that far away), and when we got there, couldn't find a place to sit--so many people & too small of a room. They provide a very average free breakfast at most. Our room was very clean & large, but no toiletries are provided except the liquid soap/shampoo in a dispenser in the shower. We also found that this hotel is on a very steep hill, so walking anywhere is not an option. Branson appears to have many budget hotels, so we would probably try somewhere else next time.

Reviews.Title: “Liked it so well we plan on coming back!”
Reviews.Author: MarcellaandTom
Reviews.Content: We researched all the Branson hotels on Trip Advisor before booking, and settled on Angel Inn based on past customer feedback & the Angel Inn website. We are so glad that we did and we agree this is the best hotel, amenities, staff, location, etc. that you can get! The front desk personnel were helpful and attentive. Every morning, Michelle greeted you with a cheery "good morning!" in the breakfast room. She was very attentive and diligent about checking food levels, cleaning up counters and tables and running the dining area. She was wonderful and we left her a nice tip on our last morning there. In fact, I'd say she deserves a raise! It's nice that you can get toast or bagels, donuts, fruit, cereal, etc. every day and that the hot dish is either eggs and french toast one day or biscuits and gravy the next. Something different each day, depending on how many days you stay. My only suggestion for the breakfast room is that when there are bus tours staying there, the breakfast room is very crowded and seating is limited, so maybe building onto the room to make more room for seating would be helpful for all involved. The rooms were immaculate and housekeeping did an awesome job of cleaning them daily. My boyfriend appreciated that there was a hair/body wash dispenser on the wall in the shower so he wouldn't even have had to bring his own. We also left them a tip on our last morning there for the housekeeping staff. The service staff really do a good job and deserve a tip for their hard work! The indoor pool/hot tub area is nice and relaxing (as long as there isn't a slew of kids in there). Great that you can go swimming indoor at a hotel in October when all the other hotels with outdoor pools have drained theirs! We also appreciated that there was a fridge for drinks and ice in our room and to keep our leftovers in, and a microwave to warm them up in. Saves a lot of money and is a great benefit! The pillow top mattresses were nice and we slept great. We didn't have to run the heater but did run the air conditioner. We wouldn't really have had to if only we could have gotten the cool outside air into the room with a fan feature or some sort of fan in the room. Also, be aware that somehow the faucets were wired backwards (in our room at least) with H actually being Cold and C actually being Hot. Not a big deal for us adults once we figured it out but maybe for kids it would be confusing. Angel Inn is just a block off the strip and you can take the yellow route if you don't want to go on the strip. The grounds are well lit and feel safe and we liked the balconies to stand or sit and just relax. If you stay in the back of the first building, watch for the volcano going off at night at the nearby dinosaur miniature golf establishment. Kinda cool! We really enjoyed our stay at Angel Inn and plan on returning in the future! Keep up the great work and offering excellent value to your travelers!

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable and great location”
Reviews.Author: traumaERrn
Reviews.Content: They advertize comfortable beds and they are! The location was good- just off the "strip" and close to Walmart & McDonalds! We were VERY satisfied with our stay here and will probably stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Euro Pillowtop Beds Were Wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: snt314
Reviews.Content: They call the beds pillowtops, but they're really eurotops with about 3 inches of cushion on top. They were so comfortable I had to look and see who the manufacturer was(Denver Mattress Co.) because we've been wanting to get a new mattress at home. We were also impressed with how soundproof the rooms were. Needless to say, we didn't get up in time for breakfast so I can't comment on that. We will definitely recommend this hotel to others! Three weeks after our stay at this hotel, we stayed at their sister hotel AmazInn and Suites. It was just as nice and closer to Silver Dollar City. Now we have 2 really nice hotels to choose from.

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful vacation”
Reviews.Author: greatlinda
Reviews.Content: The Angel Inn was a wonderful place to stay while enjoying the sights and shows in Branson. The location was terrific. The staff was very courteous and helpful. The breakfast was always a good selection. The bed was comfortable and the pillows were great. Each of the 7 nights we stayed there, we slept like babies. Nice and quiet. Parking was also no problem at all the whole week.

Reviews.Title: “If you want a nice place, Angel Inn is it!”
Reviews.Author: Seeingthesights56
Reviews.Content: We stayed for three great nights. Nice and clean. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Gave us phone number for discount on show tickets and the tickets where delivered right to the hotel. Now that is service. Had a warm breakfast every morning. I will stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “AWSOME”
Reviews.Author: shamilton1995
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were on a trip alone with no kids. We enjoyed our stay. The employees were all friendly and helpful. Breakfast was good, very clean, comftable, convient location, and the price is right. This was our second stay, and we have reservations coming up in November for a family get away.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay in Branson!”
Reviews.Author: NCtraveler1944
Reviews.Content: Wonderful experience at Angel Inn in Branson. Rooms are very nice, clean, and roomy. Staff was very friendly and accommodating. Location is just a block off the main road, but was extremely quiet. Continental breakfast was very nice. Would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Angel Inn is great and we will definitely stay there again!”
Reviews.Author: tootie1967
Reviews.Content: Great location. Clean rooms. Comfy beds. Friendly and helpful staff. Parking is nice also. I would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Great pillowtop bed”
Reviews.Author: lghstes
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Angel Inn in Branson,MO from 8/21-8/25.The bed was comfortable had a great night sleep. We did not hear a sound from outside or any of the rooms.The room was clean and had plenty of space.We checked out on the 24th and I told the clerk that the carpet needed cleaning.He said he was so sorry and would have it taken care of as soon as possible.We went to Springfield but decided to return to Branson and stay at the Angel Inn again.The clerk said that we couldn't get the same room and we got the room next door.The curtains were opened in the room we had before and mattress and everything was stacked up and they were cleaning the carpet.When we got home there was an e-mail which said that they were sorry about the carpet .That is what I called great service.We will stay at the Angel Inn again.

Reviews.Title: “Find another hotel”
Reviews.Author: peg45068
Reviews.Content: Customer service is not their forte. Asked for a handicap room and was put on 4th floor--noticed this before going to room and asked if we could have a handicap room and was told we have an elevator. (Does a lot of good if fire broke out) Thought they may have been booked solid, not the case in 3 nights there was only 1 car parked on the ground floor. Swimming pool was closed for painting, was told we could still use hot tub but the bottom was filthy and noise awful from the workers painting with machines. After complaining was told we could go down the street and swim at the Radisson. Breakfast was horrible!! All 4 of us threw more away than we ate and we very seldom waste food. The bed was comfortable and it was quiet but that is the only good thing we can say.

Reviews.Title: “Nice beds, otherwise good, but nothing to write home about”
Reviews.Author: DR4296
Reviews.Content: Just finishing up a four night stay here. (Our original plan was to switch hotels after two nights if we weren't happy with this one. However, in the end, we decided to stay here, because it was less of a gamble than moving elsewhere.) Rooms are spacious... probably a bit more than competitors... since this is a former Hampton Inn. However, this is one of those exterior-access / balcony-access hotels...no interior hallways to get to your room. That said, this is probably considered to be high-quality of that tier of hotels. Our room was clean, though housekeeping seemed a bit inconsistent in some things (ice bucket emptied and cleaned-up one day, but not the next). I was showering the first morning and bumped the lower soap dish with my knee... and the dish fell off (and thankfully, didn't hit me because it was pretty heavy-duty). Maintenance had it fixed the next day. One front desk person was very friendly and helpful. The other...well... not as much. When we asked for extra towels, they actually recorded in the computer that our room had received two extra towels! (Wow, talk about making you feel like you're in some sort of "camp"!) Which was silly, because you can walk right into the pool area and steal slightly-smaller towels all day if you want. My wife complained that the towels were very scratchy. Called them "sandpaper towels". Air conditioner pumped out cold air, which we were very thankful for, given that it's been 100 degrees all week. My wife and I agree that the best feature of our stay was the pillowtop mattress. We had some great night sleeps and one afternoon nap. This is what kept us at this motel. The pool is smaller than photos would have you think. I think perhaps, given the high volume of families here this week (right before back-to-school), we would have used the pool more if it had been a bit bigger and less crowded. But hey, there are plenty of other hotels around here that I can see with same sized pool. One thing where they're obviously cutting corners though: energy expenses for the pool area. Despite the fact that this is an indoor pool, I was disappointed to find it with windows wide-opened all around... and the water unheated. So, it's basically like being at an outdoor pool with sun and rain protection. I'm sure one might say that they wouldn't want to be air conditioned in an indoor pool area....might be too cold. But if it's 100 degrees or is very humid outside, you might. Breakfast offerings seemed in keeping with what just about every other hotel offers for a continental breakfast. Biscuits and gravy some days, french toast others, doughnuts, breads, and cereals otherwise. Breakfast was usually quite crowded. We're thinking of coming back to Branson in two months for a shorter stay. If we do, I will most likely try to cough up the extra $20-25 per night to put us into a hotel one notch higher. Still, if you're trying to stretch your money and you don't mind a balcony-access hotel, give this hotel at least a one night try.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable, affordable, accessible”
Reviews.Author: bssfuller
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in this motel with my husband and grandchildren so I knew it was a nice motel...this time I was traveling solo. The staff was considerate, helpful, and accomodating to all my needs to make me feel safe and comfortable. Will definitely be returning to this motel.

Reviews.Title: “A very refreshing place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Kellie64
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed 2 nites in July, 2010, Staff was very friendly and helpful. Room was very spacious, Clean, and the bed was so soft and comfortable had trouble getting up in the morning just wanted to sleep in. Was a very quite area couldnt hear people next door or above us which was wonderful. Breakfast was different each day. Good variety and delish. Location was very close to the main strip. No doubt that we will return to this wonderful hotel.

Reviews.Title: “An amazing stay”
Reviews.Author: ColeRi84
Reviews.Content: We found Angel Inn online and you never know what you are going to get when you do that. Once we arrived we were very happy to see a very nice hotel. Our rooms were very clean and nice. The breakfast was great and it was nice that they changed it up from one day to the next. We had a great stay and would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Everything you need and more.”
Reviews.Author: Proverbs1821
Reviews.Content: This was my second time to stay here. I loved it. It is convenient to everything. I love that it has an indoor pool and hot tub for the kids. No need to worry about sunscreen. The pillowtop mattresses are great. Having the refrigerator and microwave are wonderful. It is definitely affordable and clean. The service desk ladies are very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Just ok”
Reviews.Author: kpcdk
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 5 nights July 24-29. The hotel grounds seemed better kept at the beginning of the stay, the last two days trash was not picked up around the property. The room seemed fairly clean when we checked in. Our sheets were not changed at all during our stay, even after we requested this on the fourth day. We could tell because there was a stain on one pillow case. We arrived back to the room late one afternoon and housekeeping was just entering our room to clean, since our room overlooked the pool we waited there and were able to watch. He was done quickly, he did not change linens or vaccume. The location was great, the breakfast was fine and the coffee was very good.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel was nice, but was disappointed with the service.”
Reviews.Author: xdeeannx
Reviews.Content: I researched a number of hotels in the Branson area before our trip. I found Angel Inn on Tripadvisor, and most of the reviews were wonderful. And with the price being a great deal, I figured why not try this hotel. We arrived on Saturday and the room was nice, very comfortable beds and it seemed clean. After checking in, we decided to go swimming. The pool was smaller than the pictures I seen on the website, but it was good enough. The stay was fine until Monday. The first encounter we had with a lady at the front desk who was very rude, was when my fiancee went to the desk to turn in our dirty towels and ask for some new ones. The lady told my fiancee, in a rude way,"I don't even know if we have any towels to give you. " We got three and that was it. The next encounter was later that day. We slept in a little Monday after a full day at Silver Dollar City on Sunday. I got in the shower about 11:00 am and had a full head of shampoo, when the water just stopped. We had no water at all in our room. My sister went to the office and spoke to the same older woman at the office. When my sister told the lady we had no water. The lady just grabbed a letter ( that we had never seen anywhere) and said "didn't you get one of these?" My sister said no, and the lady said "well we tried to call every room", and she offered no other solution. When my sister arrived back at the room and told me what she said, I decided to call the front desk and speak to someone. The same lady, who didn't seem to interested in my problem, said "well I told the lady who just came down, you should have recieved a call and got a letter, what would you like us to do?" I said "I have been in our room all morning, no one has called. And when we checked in on the 24th (this is also the day the letter was dated), we received no letter." I said," I am full of shampoo and body wash, what am I suppose too do? " She said,"well the water is expected to be off most of the day." I said "well can I get into another room just to finish showering, I am full of soap." She said "yeah well we will see what we can do", and hung up. Then she called back and said, "well come to the office and get a key to take a shower" So I went to the front desk and she said well I am sorry about that. Which is great, I'll accept the apology, but she did not seem very sincere and was still rude. I said, will this be a move for the night with the water being off all day? As noone could use the bathroom or anything. And her response was, again very rude tone," well Ma'am what do you want to do?" I said I just want to wash all the soap off of me. So I got another key to a room and go tto finish my shower. Which was a great solution, after I suggested it. I would probably of had soap all over me for the rest of the day, if I hadn't brought it up. I was under the impression that at a hotel, the staff works with their customers to make them happy. This was not the case with this particular lady. I was not impressed with her, she seemed very rude and wasn't friendly at all. And the letter my sister got from the lady was dated 7/24, this incident happend on 7/26. I would have thought a letter about the water being shut off for the day, should have been put on display at the front desk, or given to us at check-in, or posted on the entry door to the office so all the guests would be prepared for this. Overall, the hotel is nice. Breakfast was not bad at all. The bed was very comfortable, and we did get a good night sleep. One thing that was puzzling to me is, the cleaning people continued to clean the rooms the day that all the water was shut off. I don't know how the rooms could have been cleaned thoroughly with no water. The lady at the front desk was awful, she is not someone who should be working in hospitality. Also, the computer that was int he lobby for use by the guests was out of order the whole time we were there. We did have to check out a day early due to having to make an emergency trip to the dentist. I was not charged for the extra night, that was nice and got no complaints when checking out. But the rude woman at the front desk, stared us down when we went in to checkout. She was watching the man that took care of us at checkout, like he should have charged us for the other night. I will not be staying at this hotel again in the future. I would recommend this hotel only because the rate is good and the beds are wonderful. But I would warn to watch out for rude service.

Reviews.Title: “very rude”
Reviews.Author: KINGPIN63125
Reviews.Content: Lets See We Get There On 7-24-2010 AT 3 O'clock in the Evening Check IN. Everything's Fine Until Monday Morning My Wife Is in the shower and They Shut Of The Water. She Has Soap In Her Hair. So I Go And Ask Why The Water Is Shut Off . The LADY at the counter said in a very rude way, " DIDN'T YOU GET ONE OF THESE'" IT was letter dated on the 24th OF JULY that the water will be shut off ON MONDAY. I said no I didn't get a A DAMN LETTER. She said well we called everyone's room to tell them that the water was shut off. just one thing i was not in my room when they called i was at silver dollar city with my family. so if you go tell LOIS i said hi. PS THEY DON'T HAVE A WASHER OR DRYER IN CASE YOU NEED ONE FOR THOSE WET CLOTHES FROM THE PARKS.

Reviews.Title: “If you like Hampton's but want a deal... You'll love Angel Inn”
Reviews.Author: ArkansasTransplants
Reviews.Content: When traveling for business my husband has almost always chosen Hampton Inn's. So when I read a review that said the Angel in was formerly a Hampton It got my attention. However the price of the room made me wonder if it had been run down since then, but from other reviews I took the chance. We were not disappointed! It is an older model with the outside access to rooms and no elevators, but once we stepped inside it was like visiting an old friend. The bed and pillows were so comfy, and the furniture, fixtures and even the towels and shower curtain were just like being in a Hampton for half the price. The staff was very friendly even the pool man went out of his way to take care of me when I wanted to use the jacuzzi after breakfast and he was servicing it and the pool. Located just off the strip and very easy to access the colored routes that will save you so much time in getting places if you get a map and use it. Considering the cost of the room the Breakfast was a great deal. If you have special needs for shampoo you might want to bring you own, as they have the dispenser in the shower with a combo Shower gel/ shampoo ( that smelled really great ) Tip.. if your room is on the third floor, park in the spots on the side close to the office and use stairs from that side.. you will only have one flight of stairs vs. driving around back and entering from the center of the building. Angel Inn will be our choice for a weekend get away from now on!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome place to stay for the price, location, and most of all, a good night sleep.”
Reviews.Author: bulldogcountry1
Reviews.Content: Angel Inn is located in walking distance from Wal-Mart and adjoins a mall that has a variety of free wholesome musical entertainment which are two of the conveniences we benefited from staying there. What made our vacation most enjoyable and pleasurable was the good night sleep my husband and I obtained from their pillow top mattress. When we first arrived at Angel Inn, we paid for one night to find out if their advertisement was a true statement in which we would sleep like an angel. Well, after the first night they had us sold by the statement and we stayed an additional 4 nights in which we continued to sleep like angels. I believe a good night sleep away from home is priceless!!

Reviews.Title: “DON`T STAY HERE”
Reviews.Author: ladyrebecca99
Reviews.Content: My extended family stay and I stayed here in July 2010. We had three rooms and first they moved us and separated us after we had reservations in advance. The male clerk made us stay while he checked our thousand dollars for being counterfeit. My room was nasty, it smelled, the shower was greasy and closet sized. The iron did not work and no wifi without the WEP key. The pool is super small and everyone kept diving and I complained twice and the clerk told me that she could not watch the front and the pool and did nothing. We complained and was fineally moved to the back side of the hotel with the rest of the family as we had an infant and one elderly that could not be left alone. I would never stay here again and it was a rough week. It is cheap and you do get what you pay for. The sofas in the lobby are nasty and need replacing. The breakfast was okay but no tables and they kept toppling over and everyone spilled their coffee when standing. There are more to chose from in the vicinity.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice stay !!”
Reviews.Author: Woody81
Reviews.Content: After having issues with another hotel, we drove around & decided to try this place as it was close by to our family's hotel plus advertised having microwave & fridge in all rooms.. Room was very nice and comfy, pool area/spa very spacious, and decent selection of breakfast each morning... Free wifi worked great as well!! This place seems to be well-managed and run like a family business, so if you're having problems with another place, give them a try!!

Reviews.Title: “THE PLACE IS GREAT”
Reviews.Author: momslife
Reviews.Content: the rooms are very clean we had 2 of them- the lock on on bathroom door was not engaging they fixed it without being told about it . Staff is nice and pleasant . The continental breakfast was very good they had something that appeals to everyone

Reviews.Title: “Very nice at a good price”
Reviews.Author: salgal777
Reviews.Content: Comfortable beds, quiet, near everything. Good breakfast with different choices each day.

Reviews.Title: “QUIET-CLEAN-HOMEY”
Reviews.Author: lakene
Reviews.Content: The room was clean. The beds were extra comfortable. We reserved 7 rooms and stayed 3 days.Everyone that traveled with us thought that Angel Inn was very nice. The staff was very helpful.and the price was right. The breakfast was only ok. it was fine for us older folks and the grandchildren. But others went out to eat.WE WILL STAY AGAIN

Reviews.Title: “Slept like a Baby”
Reviews.Author: smdavis1958
Reviews.Content: Excellent-Excellent-Excellent ! Everything from the friendly staff to the wonderfully restful pillowtop bed and soft comfortable pillows was Great! We stayed from 7/2 - 7/5 and could not get over what a great location it was in for such a busy Holiday weekend. I have given everything at this hotel the highest mark's possible because they deserve it ! Rooms were very clean and comfortable, morning breakfast with biscuits & gravy one day was Enjoyable. Pool and Hot tub are indoors and with a couple of late nights on the town it would have been nice if the hot tub was open until Midnight as we got "chased" out about 11:05 pm there is also no outside sitting area which would have been nice but I would Not hesitate to stay at Angel Inn during my next trip to Branson or reccommend it to friends heading that way from St Louis. Thank You Angel Inn - we had a Great Trip and you were partially responsible !

Reviews.Title: “great location and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: TravelPara
Reviews.Content: We spent two nights in the Angel Inn and got two connecting rooms. The location was great for us because there were three teen girls who wanted to be close to TCBY, Taco Bell, Wal-Mart, and the Wild Woody's go-carts. The rooms were very clean, and the beds and pillows were comfortable like others have stated, and we slept very well. The only problem one of our rooms had was the shower temperature. We were constantly turning it up and down. The service was great. Our younger girls had lost over five dollars in vending machines, and they refunded them with no questions asked. The only problems besides the shower had to do with the breakfast. First, the biscuits were raw the first morning we ate and the french toast was not very tasty the second morning. The fruit was not very good. Second, there is not much seating in the dining area. This hotel was a great value, and we will definitely be back! Next time we will just eat the fresh donuts or go out.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: JoeMac74
Reviews.Content: Good place to stay, next time in Branson will stay at the "Angel Inn".

Reviews.Title: “In December 2009 me, my wife and two...”
Reviews.Author: blakewhite23
Reviews.Content: In December 2009 me, my wife and two girls came to Branson to enjoy a Christmas in Branson. This was the first time we stayed at Angel Inn and plan to stay there again. First of all before even getting there, my brother and his family were planning on staying at the same place. I made the reservations a month or so in advance and the staff was so polite. We had planned on coming up Christmas night but snow came the night before and it was very cold. Even though I called to cancel that one night and was not able to give the required 48 hours notice, the staff again was so polite and took that night off our reservation with no hassle. Once we got the the rooms were clean and beds very comfortable. They have a nice indoor pool and good breakfast. The rooms had a little refrigerator and microwave with no extra charge. The winter price was around $60 a night so that was not bad at all. I definitely recommend this hotel to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “We stayed here 2 years ago for our son's wedding at C of O -so stayed here again for our niece's wedding at C of O!!”
Reviews.Author: survivor05
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Angel Inn 2 years ago for our son's wedding at College of the Ozarks. We were so pleased that we booked it again on June 4th of this year to attend our niece's wedding at C of O the next day. We were very pleased with the service!! Our family of 7 rented 2 rooms, plus some of our extended family rented 3 rooms. We were even allowed to use the breakfast area in the evening to share BBQ and family time together. The kids enjoyed the pool, and some of the adults enjoyed swimming laps in the pool early in the morning. Hot tub was nice too. Rooms were very clean. Great value too! Very friendly staff.

Reviews.Title: “Good Economic Choice”
Reviews.Author: katiebrat
Reviews.Content: I recently planned a trip to Branson and was looking for a reasonably priced hotel that was clean and comfortable. The Angel Inn was worth every penny. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable which is about all I expected for the price. The shower had good water pressure with different settings and the fridge and microwave were a bonus.

Reviews.Title: “relaxation”
Reviews.Author: relaxedtraveler10
Reviews.Content: The room is just what we were looking for. We have stayed in Branson before but the last motels we had stayed at were not up to par due to the owners selling. This room had a refrigerator which helped us because my husband is a diabetic and we could keep his insulin cool and used the freezer for our ice packs so we could use them on the way home. Pool was alittle small but served the purpose for our eleven year old son and fifteen year old daughter. Hot tub is great for using after a day of shopping or going to Silver Dollar City, Rooms are clean and that is what I was looking for. Continental breakfast is a great way to save money and get you by until lunch. Price is was great and in our budget. Great economical and clean, clean, and clean. Made our vacation stay well worth the trip. Motel is close to the strip and on one of the access roads. Over all I would say stay here.

Reviews.Title: “My Folks Loved It”
Reviews.Author: Sandra9193
Reviews.Content: I booked 2 rooms for my folks, aunt & uncle. Angel Inn accomodated my requests for floor level and joining rooms. My family was impressed! The "continental" breakfast was much more than they expected...eggs and sausage and gravy were a nice surprise! I will definitely take my family back there. Now, that I know that we have a safe and great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable.”
Reviews.Author: twellman9885
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed staying at this clean hotel. We were able to park right outside the door. They were very accomodating, providing an extra pillow/blanket for a child's airbed. The beds/pillows were very comfortable. Enjoyed the pool and breakfast (some hot items) too. Also used their free wireless network. All for a very reasonable price!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, nice,goood location.”
Reviews.Author: SharonArnold
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed the our stay very much. The people were very friendly and helpful,the rooms were clean, and we loved the pillowtop mattresses. The location was excellent.

Reviews.Title: “It was very good for the family”
Reviews.Author: dairyman5015
Reviews.Content: loved the inn this was the first time we stayed at this inn but will defentily be staying there again next time we come to Branson

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Mitchell1701
Reviews.Content: Highly recommend this to those with children. Nice location, nice rooms, great pool/hot tub, friendly staff. Have a light breakfast in the morning. Quiet location about a block off the strip. Close to Silver Dollar City also...about 5 minutes.

Reviews.Title: “One of Branson's Best Hotels”
Reviews.Author: wa0bkp
Reviews.Content: The Angel Inn's accommodation was excellent. The rooms were clean and all amenities were up to date and all function correctly. Housekeeping was also excellent. The beds were soft and the hot breakfast varied from Biscuits & Gravy to Scrambled Eggs and French Toast. Fruit, cereal, donuts and other items were also available. The enclosed poll was kept clean. The prices was more than reasonable for the quality received. Staff were great! Would recommend this to all my friends.

Reviews.Title: “Conveniently Located and Clean as can Be.”
Reviews.Author: Geoark1946
Reviews.Content: This was not a disappointment at all the room was clean the shower worked well the AC worked the TV was good and the location could not be better. Easy to get to and about half way down 76.

Reviews.Title: “It was a nice clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: OylerFamily
Reviews.Content: The service was good, always had our room cleaned. We had a pleasant stay.

Reviews.Title: “great night's sleep”
Reviews.Author: debr10
Reviews.Content: The beds and pillows at this inn are the best we have experienced. We will most assuredly stay at Angel Inn while in Branson. They were first rate in every sense, but the wonderful restful comfort of the beds were the most enjoyable part of our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Fun Little Trip the with Grandson, Daughter and the Auntie”
Reviews.Author: slbook
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd stay at the Angel Inn It is a really good bargain. Love the beds! The pool and hot tub are nice and the breakfast is always well supplied. I like the hard boiled eggs as well as the other treats like french toast and biscuits and gravy. The staff is very friendly. I just have nothing negative to say about this place.

Reviews.Title: “The hotel was quick to answer questions and had a clean, comfortable establishment.”
Reviews.Author: debsbeth
Reviews.Content: Each morning breakfast was ready and waiting. It was a good hot breakfast, not diet friendly, and the dining area could be over crowded, but well taken care of and someone was always checking on the food and supplies. I appreciated the way that each employee was always easy to talk to, yet not overly curious, the staff was always helpful and courteous (whether on the phone or in person). The rooms were clean and well maintained. And the room arrangements allowed for the most usable space.The location was just enough off the main drag that it was easy to find our way around, and yet just off the way enough that it was quiet. The pool and hot tub were somewhat small, but being indoor made it much more usable. I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, wish they were located on the east coast.”
Reviews.Author: oldmac67
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best hotels I have stayed in. You can't beat the price for everything that is offered. Most comfortable beds of any hotel. Rooms are large and comfortable. I was traveling with a group of friends, riding motorcycles, they staff made arrangements for us to have an area to wash our bikes, what a treat. This was an A+ stay!

Reviews.Title: “You Can't go wrong”
Reviews.Author: garyglot
Reviews.Content: We based our choice of Angel Inn on other reviews we had read. Most of those reviews were "right on". Good value; clean, great mattresses, very nice breakfast which changed from day to day; courteous & friendly staff; indoor pool and spa a nice treat too. We stayed 6 nights; would do it again. Very, very convenient location.

Reviews.Title: “Very pleased with Angel Inn”
Reviews.Author: pfflyer57
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Angel Inn for one night and found it to be a great value for the price. The room was clean and well appointed with comfortable beds. I would recommend this hotel for anyone heading to Branson, MO.

Reviews.Title: “We Loved It!”
Reviews.Author: Lori000
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful stay. We chose this hotel blindely off the internet for the price but when we got there we were impressed. The rooms were spacious and clean,and the beds were more comfortable than mine at home. They had a good size pool and hot tub, very clean. The breakfast was excellent too. It was a little more than toast and juice; just right to start the day. The location of the hotel was perfect; you were right in the middle of everything and yet just off the beaten path. The staff was very friendly and courteous. You absolutely could not beat the value for what we got. We would recommend this hotel to anyone and hope to stay there again soon. We love to visit Branson and this just makes it that much better.

Reviews.Title: “Great room at good price”
Reviews.Author: pickyone_10
Reviews.Content: My husband and I just stayed at the Angel Inn four nights last week. The rooms look just like the pictures on their website. Nicely decorated, very comfortable beds, spacious room, very clean. The whole place was immaculate. Great location too, close to the strip without the traffic. We didn't use the pool or hot tub, but the area looked very well kept and inviting. Plenty of tables and chairs around pool area. The cont. breakfast provided was good and there was ample food. We ate toward the end of the serving time and there was still plenty. Staff very nice as well. We tend to stay at different motels each time we visit Branson, but this is one we will stay at again.

Reviews.Title: “The Best Place To Stay in Branson- Excellent Value”
Reviews.Author: myres
Reviews.Content: We were very happy with staying at the Angel Inn. The prices were fantastic and the hotel was very clean. Everyone was friendly and the hot breakfast is very good quality. We'd recommend the Angel Inn to anyone :)

Reviews.Title: “Best rest in Branson”
Reviews.Author: RoamingRobyn1959
Reviews.Content: Angel Inn is without a doubt one of the cleaniest and safest motels I have ever stayed in. The staff was courteous and helpful and they went out of their way to make sure our stay was perfect.

Reviews.Title: “This is great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: rodeotompkins
Reviews.Content: The beds were very comfortable and had a great night of sleep. The rooms were a nice size and everything was very clean. Very pleased with this choice.

Reviews.Title: “Very pleased”
Reviews.Author: daisy66617
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with this hotel. The staff went out of their way to serve you and the rooms were very clean and comfortable. The price was very reasonable and even included a nice breakfast. I would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “very clean, quiet, beds very comfortable”
Reviews.Author: voodooBuffalo
Reviews.Content: the staff very helpful room was clean bed was great good location.

Reviews.Title: “Three times a charm”
Reviews.Author: MieMieK
Reviews.Content: We stay at the Angel Inn when we come to Branson because it is priced right, clean and in a great location. We got the King jacuzzi room this time and it was wonderful. Plenty of hot water and the room also had a microwave and a fridge. We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “I was very pleasantly surprised.”
Reviews.Author: Lindhy
Reviews.Content: This is an older motel that is moderately priced and is not part of a chain, so I expected it to be adequate but not exceptional. As it turns out, I found it to be very clean, and there were a number of upgrades - such as all new bathroom fixtures and floor, wonderful pillow top mattresses, a very nice indoor pool, and a very good breakfast in a spacious breakfast room. The staff was helpful and interacted well with guests. I would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “overall pleasant stay.”
Reviews.Author: happydadindiana
Reviews.Content: great room with everything you need. fridge, microwave, hair dryer, cofee maker. close too everything in town. great staff. great breakfast. we will stay at the angel inn when we go to branson every year.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: ColoradoMrC
Reviews.Content: We were traveling as a high school band from Colorado and this was one of the few places in Branson that took the extra steps to accomadate the needs of the chaperones with all those kids. I would highly recomend the Angel Inn to any school group.

Reviews.Title: “Very wonderful and accomidateing, room was clean, personel friendly.”
Reviews.Author: rdale51
Reviews.Content: The room that we were allowed to be in was for handicapped and with my leg being a little shorter it was greatly appreciated. The continental breakfast was very filling and well stocked, all the personnel was courteous and helpful. The location of the hotel was easy to access and go to attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Close to everything, good bed, good breakfast, fun.”
Reviews.Author: nanymeeks
Reviews.Content: We reserved 3 rooms for our group of seniors and we all had a wonderful time. They placed our rooms together as we requested and they were all very nice rooms. When arranging for others it is always a concern that all are happy with their rooms. Everyone in our party was very happy with the accomodations. We had a wonderful time.

Reviews.Title: “i'll be back”
Reviews.Author: amafolks
Reviews.Content: really nice. off the strip but close eough the travel time is short. staff was great and the rooms were really nice. we are really apprehensive of staying at a hotel that is not in the national change but this one is really the exception. we will be back

Reviews.Title: “Worth more than you'll pay.”
Reviews.Author: Kansan57
Reviews.Content: Pros: Well maintained. Clean room. Refrigerator and microwave in the room. Comfortable beds. Very affordable (2 nights = total $110). Large rooms. Whirlpool in tub. Free, albeit limited, breakfast. Central location for driving, not walking. Indoor pool. Friendly and helpful staff. WiFi. Cons: Thin walls. Tip: Ask for a room without a balcony and away from a stairwell. They are very noisy because of how they are constructed. Ask for a room at the end of the main building so you will have easy access to the breakfast and pool, and so you will be away from other guest noises outside.

Reviews.Title: “Thoroughly enjoyed our stay.”
Reviews.Author: winbeck
Reviews.Content: Front desk staff were friendly & very helpful. The breakfast bar was fresh, hot, & very tasty. The room was spacious & cleaned daily. We were able to park right at our door. Very convenient location, yet in a quiet area about 2 blocks off Hwy. 76. Priced right. We stayed 5 nights & were very pleased.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: AssiVanBurenAR
Reviews.Content: Our rooms were very clean. Helpful and friendly staff. My husband and I stayed in a different hotel in Branson a couple weeks earlier, but I would always recommend the Angel Inn. Great price for a quiet room. Breakfast was good. Nothing to complain about.

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel in Branson”
Reviews.Author: rodney57
Reviews.Content: When we checked into the hotel, the desk clerk David did a great job getting us the room we wanted.....In fact he went out of his way to help us out. David also told us about some great places to eat. The maint man (larry) was always there if we needed any the taken care of in the room. The cleanest hotel we have stayed at. WE WILL STAY THERE EVERY TIME WE GO TO BRANSON.......Thanks alot

Reviews.Title: “wouldnt stay any place else”
Reviews.Author: ladybugcoe
Reviews.Content: The service at the Angel Inn was fabulous. There was always someone available and very friendly at the front desk when ever you needed them. The rooms were spotless . The room service people were great and very accomadating . The breakfast was beyond great. Better than most hotels we have been at . They seved hot breakfast every morning with a friendly faces .We had Biscuits and gravy one morning along with all your pastrys , cereal,fresh fruit ,oj ,milk,coffee , eggs and then the one morning French Toast and more . You wont find that any place we could find for what they charge per night. You will spend more going out to eat Especially if you are traveling with kids. I give the service at the Angel Inn 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: “So So”
Reviews.Author: chanceyblu
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 6 nights. Booked thru a discount travel website. When we checked in we asked if we could upgrade to a room with fridge and micro seeing we would be there for so long we were told by the gentleman that if we had booked with them directly they could do that but not seeing we did it thru discount site. Beds were comfy...breakfast not so great. We decided we would rather pay 4.99 at the maybe breakfast buffets in town then eat the breakfast there. We did try it one day but were not impressed. First day of room cleaning my shampoo and conditioner disappeared. Went thru bags...not there. Weird! We had a non smoking room on the third floor but the bathroom smelled like smoke all the time. If we turned the fan on it would usually take care of the problem but in a non smoking room it shouldn't be a problem. Overall okay for price but we don't plan on staying there next time.

Reviews.Title: “Never Again”
Reviews.Author: Cooker93
Reviews.Content: We booked online with a ticket agent and they booked our rooms. We are elderly adults and were booked rooms on the 3rd floor - and no elevator. We tried to change rooms - the difference in cost was about $10 a night, but they wanted $54 total for 3 nights. Breakfast was ok, but leaves alot to be desired also. Would stay again only if we had the 1'st floor or the part of the hotel with an elevator.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: Dave001HanoverPa
Reviews.Content: When we checked in, Dave at the front desk gave us very helpful information about getting around Branson and eating at Montana Mikes. Our room smelled so good when we entered it. The room was very nicely decorated and the bed was extremely comfortable. The air conditioner worked great considering the hot temperature outside. Using the jacuzzi tub was a nice way to end each day. I would highly recommend the Angel Inn to anyone visiting Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice motel.”
Reviews.Author: craftygranny
Reviews.Content: We stayed three nightsand thought the motel was above average. The rooms were clean and spacious. The employees were very accomodating and very gracious. The parking space was great. We will definitely will stay here again and will certainly recommend it to our friends. We had a family reunion and had 4 rooms -- not one person complained about the motel.

Reviews.Title: “Didn't honor price!”
Reviews.Author: DickJane82
Reviews.Content: Called hotel direct. When got to hotel price wasn't right. Couldn't remember the price for sure at first. Pd $53. I said we were quoted different price, actually same as Amazing Inn. Manager said they'd go to $49-lowest price they have. I didn't think this was right. Walking upstairs saw a room with micro/refrig and remembered $49 price of that type of room and 1st floor-we were quoted $44 for 2nd floor and no micro/refig. Wouldn't change price when I told them. So between our 2 rooms and days they made $60 extra dollars. Bathroom totally small. Whirl pool wasn't commercial type-had scum in suds. Internet never worked unless you sat outside on walk way or in lobby. I feel a rip off!! Didn't honor what they promised at all! And when told price was lower, manager said this is their lowest price. Not good to lie to guests!

Reviews.Title: “Will Stay Again!”
Reviews.Author: griffsgirl
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Angel Inn because a friend had stayed there and liked it. We had a very quiet, clean, comfortable room. The hotel was perfectly situated behind Branson 76 Mall and was convenient to all the attractions. The people were warm and friendly. The breakfasts were filling (although the biscuit gravy was rather bland). We are hoping to visit Branson again in the near future and will stay at Angel Inn again.

Reviews.Title: “Our first visit to Branson”
Reviews.Author: OkLiltraveler
Reviews.Content: Got a good deal with the Branson tourism, The room was great, clean , and since it was off season for Branson things were pretty quite, good fresh breakfast, right next to Wal mart is always a plus.I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Check your room”
Reviews.Author: big325
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Angel Inn with a large group of over 50 people. The place was fairly clean,beds comfortable. The extended breakfast left alot to be desired. The staff was helpful. In the end we were accused of buring a hole in a chair, with an iron, but nobody in that room used any iron. They were trying to get an extra 96 dollads out of the group. Because of that I wouldn't stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Clean, Clean”
Reviews.Author: ipdchick
Reviews.Content: Living in Mo., Branson is the closest vacation getaway we have, so we have stayed in several area hotels. Angel Inn, Very nice exterior appearance (baby pink color everywhere), lobby pretty and clean, everyone was extremely nice. Rooms appeared to be a little larger than a typical room, bathroom was extremely clean along with beds and furniture. Room extras, iron, iron board, hair dryer, small coffee maker and coffee, little soaps and one shampoo. Free breakfast, donuts,toast, cereals, biscuits and gravy, fruit cocktail, hard boiled eggs,bananas,orange juice,apple juice, ice water, coffee, hot chocolate,tea,and milk. Pool and hot tub in a nice clean area, with tables and chairs.

Reviews.Title: “Pretty Much Average”
Reviews.Author: bobarb4853
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed 3 nights at the Angel Inn,after seeing their web site on the internet,and it was just an average room,nothing luxurious about it at all.They claimed to have "luxurious pillow top mattresses",which is the main reason we chose to stay there,and ,technically, they were pillow tops,but they were low end and not luxurious at all.The staff that we encountered were not overly friendly or helpful,but that's okay,we didn't go to Branson to make friends with the staff of the Angel Inn! The continental breakfast they served was just very mediocre and generic,we only ate it once during our stay,but for anyone that does want breakfast,you'd better plan on getting up early,it's served from 6:30-9:30.A few things I personally did not care for was a few of their housekeeping "rules". There was a small sign by the sink that stated that if any personal item was left on your bed,the bed would not be made that day because their staff was not allowed to move anything,so if while you're getting dressed in the morning and leave your nightgown laying on your bed,or maybe an extra pillow you brought from home,your bed won't be made that day! Our first night there my husband and I got hot and tossed off the bedspreads and they were not replaced on the beds during our entire stay.The housekeeper folded them up and layed them on the floor,so we had no bedspreads after our first night,which I thought was a bit overboard.The last night of our stay,my husband got into his bed to find out it had been short sheeted.He didn't feel that he should have to be the one to remake his bed,that we paid good money to sleep in,so he had a very uncomfortable night.The best thing about our room was the tv,got great reception and had lots of channels.Don't know if we'll stay at Angel Inn again or not,It's definetly not the worse placed we've ever stayed,but not the best either.Just average.

Reviews.Title: “What a welcome surprise!”
Reviews.Author: Mimito6
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed one night at Angel Inn in Branson.... I booked the room after reading the review on Trip Advisor... What a wonderful hotel! Our rooms were sparkling clean and the front desk was oh so helpful.... I had booked the room over the internet for a discounted price... Imagine my surprise the next morning at checkout when the room rate had been discounted even more! The pool and hot tub were great, as was the location of the hotel... Just right off the strip, yet noise was not a problem... The free "hot" breakfast the next morning was a lifesaver... There was a huge selection of cereals, bagels, bread, hard boiled eggs, oatmeal, hot biscuits n gravy, fruit and juices.... We will definately be returning to the Angel Inn at Christmas Time.... I'm already looking forward to our trip!

Reviews.Title: “Very disappointed!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: TNC1991
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed in this hotel for 3 nights. We went to check in our room around 3:45 pm (check in is 3pm) we were told at first our room wasnt ready & we were going to have to come back after 4. Come to find out our room was ready. Once we got into our room, it had such a strong musty, mold smell we had to go buy room spray so just we could stay in it. 8:30 the next morning, housekeeping shows up and wants to clean our room. I told this man 3 times to "come back later." he acted like he didn't understand a word I was saying. he kept saying "what". Fustrated, I finally said "never mind!" He said "oh! ok you dont want your room cleaned" and walked off. That afternoon, after calming down, I went and complained to the manager, what had happend that morning with housekeeping. They were extremely rude and sarcastic about it. The only good thing, I can say, about this hotel. Is the young woman who prepared the breakfast each morning, did a wonderful job with a smile on her face. Needless to say, I will never stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Angel Inn Was Worth the Stay!”
Reviews.Author: AirForceRetired
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Angel Inn after reading the reviews from TripAdvisor. My wife and I planned a short visit to Branson to see some shows, Silver Dollar City and a few other side trips. Angel Inn is worth the stay. The staff was very friendly, knew the area (the traffic in Branson is horrible) to avoid traffic and helped with any travel concerns we had. The breakfast was plenty and abundant.. Bisuits and gravy one morning, french toast another along with breads, fruit, eggs, and many other things to pick from. The room was clean and the beds were great! If there was anything negative to say, I cannot think of it! They really took care of us!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place for Family Reunion”
Reviews.Author: PATBKFD
Reviews.Content: We booked our family reunion at Angel Inn and could not have been treated any better and the pillow top beds were great. We had family members from 5 to 75 year of age everyone enjoyed their stay. They were very accomodating. We would not hesitate to stay there again. In fact we are planning our 2009 reunion there. Thanks to all the staff at Angel Inn for making our week end reunion GREAT.

Reviews.Title: “A great place”
Reviews.Author: HappyTraveler1967
Reviews.Content: We truly enjoyed our 3 nights at this hotel in early May, 2008. Our room was clean, spacious and well-appointed. The front desk and housekeeping staff members were very friendly, efficient and accommodating. Coffee, tea and hot chocolate was available 24 hours and their continental breakfast was very adequate. The lobby and breakfast area was at all times neat and clean. It's location is great - just a block off Hwy 76 - and within walking distance of several interesting shopping venues plus a grocery store and WalMart. We plan to make reservations again at this hotel on our next trip to Branson. - Nancy

Reviews.Title: “Angel Inn is an awesome hotel”
Reviews.Author: cagirl329
Reviews.Content: Angel Inn is one of the best hotels I have stayed at in a long time and I have been coming to Branson for years as well as worked motels as well. I will always try to stay here from now on. The people are friendly and the rooms are really nice.

Reviews.Title: “Misrepresentation all the way!”
Reviews.Author: tonicarrie
Reviews.Content: This was a family trip with reservations made atleast 10 days before arrival. (We asked for two rooms next to each other.) As well, we called on our drive to Branson approx. two hours before arrival. They stated we still had the rooms. This was for I and my husband in one room and our two teens in the next room. When we arrived we were told that our rooms were one away from each other, then it went to two away, and then he showed me the map of the rooms and we were four away from each other. Not only that...we had asked that one room be King and one room be double queens. When we arrived they stated those rooms were not even by each other. I went to Branson for a vacation...not to be stressed out by worrying about my kids being so far away. They were unable to accomodate to our needs. We then had to search for another hotel...which took another 2 hours from our family trip. (at 11 PM!) This caused a very stressful evening that we had thought we had taken care of in advance. Families go on vacations together for a nice time. We made reservations, and we were lied to. We found a great room at Comfort Inn! Highly recommend them.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, food, pool, location”
Reviews.Author: napperton3116
Reviews.Content: This past September we stayed at the Angel Inn for the second time - we also stayed there in September 2006. The pool area and hot tub are always clean, the food is good and the rooms are clean and the wireless internet is always reliable. It is very close to shopping but the motel is very quiet. We will go there again next time - the only time we go elsewhere when we visit is when the motel is full.

Reviews.Title: “Poorly treated by the Angel”
Reviews.Author: ksugans
Reviews.Content: Can't really tell you how the Angel Inn is as far as amenities. Problem is they "sold" us two rooms but when we show up, they say they only have one. Their solution is to get us rooms at an inferior property in Branson. If you book with them, you should confirm your room the day before your arrival.

HotelInfo.Name: Angel Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 2350 Green Mountain Drive, Branson, MO 65616
